padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288359" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1097571"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-4033.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4033.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport"title="Dior Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1097571">dda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 12:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Certain words, combined with a scenery, pops up in my mind whenever i smell this one.<br />
Words: Class, integrity, purity, sophistication. <br />
Scenery: I envision mythical beings, like dryads or greek gods, wearing white togas, male and female, tall, stunning, casually roaming a sacred, fairytale-like garden without a care in the world.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2288359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2288359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282829" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chyuu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1843967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chyuu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Greenley-62101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Greenley"title="Greenley"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843967">chyuu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>genuinely hurts me how underrated this is. when talking about parfums de marly, this seems to go under the radar and i don't get it, it's unironically one of my favorite pdm's and hands down my favorite pdm freshie.<br />
<br />
it's a very musky citrusy scent with a touch of spice and a solid amber and woody backbone. it's simple, yet incredibly smooth and quite flexible, for formal and casual occasions in every season. performance is solid too, i get about 8 hours on my skin with moderate projection. to me it sort of has that clean laundry/bedsheets vibe to it, which i personally love. i think it's the best pdm freshie, better than percival greenley or sedley, which i've all tested, and it's kinda sad to see that this one doesn't get as much recognition as the others. sure, it's not the most innovative scent but so aren't any of the other freshies and they get a lot more talk. plus, i haven't really come across a scent that smells like this/copies this (no, i don't count lalique white, they don't smell the same at all).<br />
<br />
if you like scents that smell like clean bedsheets, highly recommended, 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2282829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2282829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271107" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HamdiNoSimp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239669.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HamdiNoSimp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-L-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-55078.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55078.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de L'Homme Eau de Parfum"title="La Nuit de L'Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239669">HamdiNoSimp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My nose is by no means "trained" like many others on this site. But I get a fresh, soft, clean and luxurious vibe from Galloway. I also receive many compliments from both young and older people. I noticed that this fragrance also doesn't get talked about much idk why. The sillage is literally perfect for me, I spray about three sprays and then go about my day. I get occasional whiffs of Galloway literally all day. Every maybe thirty minutes or so I smell it but others around me smell it as well from about 3-5ft? I'm not one to wear "loud" or fragrances that have insane sillage that reaches the ends of hallways and stuff so I like this a lot. I'll give it a 9/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2271107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2271107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="D. Gilmour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="D. Gilmour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934450">D. Gilmour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 04:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Impressions based on 742701 batch code (2017): this stuff is so nice that it definitely falls in the severely underrated category of perfumes.<br />
<br />
The opening is a smooth peppery and bright orangy refreshing blast. Shortly after, the floral and woody components elegantly join in, giving the composition a touch of complexity and added interest.<br />
<br />
Overall, the blend gives off a slightly spicy, kind of minty-floral and fresh, smooth vibe that is truly delightful. Doesn't have much evolution but it is certainly not a feature intended for this scent profile: it keeps it simple, inviting and invigorating.<br />
<br />
Galloway is quite a beautiful versatile fragrance, classy and easy going at the same time. High heat, casual and formal occasions appropriate. Lasts about 7-8 hours with moderate projection but definitely with noticeable and pleasing presence.<br />
<br />
Very happy with the purchase, look forward to test it in lower temperatures.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2260294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2260294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested out Galloway, smells somewhat medicinal to me. It is definitely mature-leaning as well. I don't find anything attractive about this fragrance, I personally wouldn't wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2259724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2259724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragZappa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656839"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1656839.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragZappa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/1888-21616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1888"title="1888"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656839">FragZappa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm going to wear this to church.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2259538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2259538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Robusto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Robusto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1199448">Robusto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 10:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunner. Absolute summer stunner. Spicy/metallic/peppery/musky. It's pretty linear from start to finish. There is a smidge of flowers in there but only up close. Longevity is what you would expect from PDM (My bottle is from 2015). It's not groundbreaking or what you would expect from a niche brand. The edges are very sharp. A little goes a long way with this one and can be cloying if you spray too much. Complements galore. <br />
<br />
Crisp white fitted tee shirt, mid-thigh chino shorts, and dock shoes. You wear Galloway when you have your s**t together and are enjoying your day off or care-free weekend. <br />
<br />
Cheers!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2257398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2257398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256659" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samanph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samanph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135419">samanph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ill start by saying that Galloway is a very underrated creation by Parfums De Marly.<br />
<br />
The combination of citruses, musk, and iris in this fragrance creates a very clean and professional scent. The black pepper adds a nice touch without being overwhelming. Its inoffensive, and Id say its a great office scent. In fact, you can pull this off on many occasions, whether formal or informal. It may not be ideal when its too cold, but thats usually the case with most citrusy fragrances.<br />
<br />
The longevity is very good; I applied three sprays on my neck and got over 7 hours. The sillage isnt too strong, but its there and noticeable, which is why its a good choice for the office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2256659"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2256659#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253031" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Icyspicy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020499"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Icyspicy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020499">Icyspicy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first heard of Parfums de Marly, Percival seemed to be the "in" scent. I first sniffed Percival spray nozzle and loved it, got official sample vial for longer evaluation and it didn't seem to perform well. Among the other samples was Galloway, and despite not being a floral scent lover, I loved this, along with Sedley, over Percival. Someday I hope/intend to include both Percival and Sedley in my inventory, but Galloway is a hidden gem. <br />
<br />
It's not feminine as florals tend to be, so I'd dig this perfume on women too but it goes well on my skin too. It doesn't seem to project much but does last 8 hrs or more although by then it's a skin scent. Nonetheless, the mild floral and musky dry down is beautiful. PdM prices are what they are, I won't write anything about that, this is my first PdM bottle (excluding sample vials).<br />
<br />
I got myself a full bottle after sampling the vial, and ordered a vial of Lalique White as well, seeing it a scent regarded as similar to Galloway. Everyone's nose isn't the same so you might perceive it different, but to me they are not identical or very close. They do have similarities - both are fresh, clean white floral smelling, but Lalique White is sweeter, perkier and longevity is lower, say 5 hours. <br />
<br />
Galloway is also fresh, clean but not as sweet smelling as Lalique White, and definitely smells richer, deeper and classier. Both do well as daily wear and office friendly, if PdM is too expensive for you, Lalique White will fill that fresh white floral scent hole but it's not identical or even very close, I see myself having both if money and closet space permit, I loved both.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2253031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2253031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243243" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243243" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243243ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243243" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 19:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sort of a niche version of the Lalique White scent profile. The more prominent and persistent citrus and orange blossom is really what separates Galloway from White, at least in terms of notes/accords. It seems the quality of materials in the Parfums de Marly may be better, but the Laliques overall value is superior. At any rate, it's a great scent profile. Its brilliant for what it is and what it does. It is a completely and perfectly inoffensive fragrance that has a slightly powdery, subdued, and clean feel. Nothing overpowers. Balanced. And just plain pleasant. Brilliantly pleasant. It has no pretensions to anything more grandiose than pleasant day wear. Although it could certainly be called into service for formal wear, it has "Office Scent" written all over it, and no doubt that was the primary intention of its creation. And they succeeded brilliantly. They knew what they had created and decided to name it appropriately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2243243"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2243243#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235157" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshLiving"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshLiving" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744">FreshLiving</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A bit too perfumey, peppery, in-your-face. Its a very punchy fragrance and lacks a smoothness which i think would round out the sharp edge more, which I believe to be necessary. Especially for the prescribed months. <br />
<br />
Maybe in the exact right situation it could shine, but I think there are just more superior products on the market and from PdM. <br />
<br />
This for me is a pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2235157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2235157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice refreshing gentlemens perfume with lots of zesty citruses and some fresh spices. It would be nice for summer: juicy and radiant, but Im not sure if the price tag is worth it, maybe its possible to find something cheaper within same fragrance profile.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2234073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2234073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230107" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trevor44454444"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2053172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trevor44454444" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Fabulous-Yuzu-75731.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75731.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fabulous Yuzu"title="Fabulous Yuzu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2053172">Trevor44454444</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A scent that u should grow on u/get used to since its very sophisticated</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2230107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2230107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222176" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222176ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222176" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, floral and a little aquatic.<br />
<br />
Opens with a citrus-aromatic aroma, its a bit sour.<br />
Smells grassy, ozonic and a little like cucumber.<br />
Very fresh and fruity, possibly pineapple?<br />
It becomes floral, has a luscious edge, maybe a little salty and aquatic too.<br />
Gets more floral after an hour, has a spicy note as well.<br />
A clean, white musk develops on the skin, alongside light woods and moss.<br />
The fruity pineapple note remains and is joined by a peppery aroma.<br />
Finally it gets muskier and a bit balsamic on the skin.<br />
<br />
This is a masculine leaning fragrance that has a throwback "nineties" feel. Would suit a guy 28+. Good for spring and summer, and fine for the office.<br />
<br />
Performance is good, lasts as a skin scent for 8hrs.<br />
<br />
It's nice but nothing ground breaking for me personally. It actually reminded me of "Cerrutti Image" for men, so if you like this you might want to try that?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2222176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2222176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2213269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Granny Autismo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Granny Autismo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Kalan-56036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kalan"title="Kalan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2213269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2213269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1678715">Granny Autismo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-09">07/09/24 13:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A Parfums de Marly underdog. I don't see that many people talking about Galloway, and I'm not sure why. People are saying that it smells boring because there is nothing challenging about it, but just because this frag is well constructed and well balanced in a non-challenging way doesn't mean that it smells boring. You come to Parfums de Marly for good fragrances, not for challenging fragrances. Now let me explain why this frag isn't boring.<br />
<br />
To begin with, I'd like to express this frag as a bomb that explodes in a uniform distribution of colourful, perfectly balanced shrapnels that harmonize to manifest a redolence that is strong but easy on the nose. I was expecting this frag to begin with a blast of citrus, but it's actually much less citrusy than I thought it'd be. This is a W in my book, because I don't like it when frags are too citrus-heavy. The black pepper is very masculine and disperses throughout the whole wear of the frag despite being labelled as a top note. The musk is very clean and very strong but incredibly smooth and not at all offensive. The orange blossom is heavy and animalic but not in an offputting or revoltingly pungent manner. The iris provides this mass-appealing powderiness but not in a generic manner. The amber is tenuously sweet. This frag has the perfect balance of EVERYTHING and is constructed in a way that is unexpectedly albeit appreciably NOT GENERIC OR BORING AT ALL. <br />
<br />
To me, the scent of this frag is reminiscent of a mall. Despite the fact that my skin chemistry is suitable for more heavier frags like Kalan, this frag performs great on my skin. I'm attributing this to the use and abundance of expensive raw materials in this frag, especially with the musks (which serve as great fixatives). I think this frag works best at a temperature range of 15-30C, with 2-4 sprays depending on your skin chemistry (I typically go with 4). <br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Season and time of day: Best in summer days, summer nights, and spring days.<br />
Gender: Masculine<br />
Longevity: Moderate (lasts 6 hrs with 4 sprays, tested in 25C weather)<br />
Sillage: Strong (projects 6 feet with 4 sprays, tested in 25C weather)<br />
Price value: Good value (taking into consideration performance, cost of raw materials, and quality of formulation)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2213269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2213269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205137" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Delicately_unapologetic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2182392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Delicately_unapologetic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Vodka-on-the-Rocks-23899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vodka on the Rocks"title="Vodka on the Rocks"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205137ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205137" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182392">Delicately_unapologetic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 15:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lowkey the best Parfums de Marly.<br />
Criminally underrated.<br />
<br />
People tend not to like this one because it smells so "plain"<br />
Does that mean it is nothing specia- No.<br />
It is special.<br />
<br />
People tend to forget that niche doesn't always means extreme/extravagant/intense scents, nor parthenogenetic.<br />
Performance is pretty strong for what the scent is. <br />
By the way you can over spray as much as you want and you wont offend anyone, you can wear this  and .<br />
<br />
To do a musky fresh spicy perfume perform like that, and making those special notes to fuse this beautiful scent, believe me this is truly ..<br />
<br />
Perfect for a daily driver.<br />
<br />
 The only con I see is that there are better options if you want something extravagant for the nighttime, but that doesn't mean you can't wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2205137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2205137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204796" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Igneal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Igneal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Les-Absolus-d-Orient-Patchouli-Ardent-60494.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60494.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Les Absolus d'Orient Patchouli Ardent"title="Les Absolus d'Orient Patchouli Ardent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182382">Igneal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial smell is a burst of pepper with a little bit of citrus note but it's dry down is superb </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2204796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2204796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198529" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AndyMomTom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AndyMomTom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198529ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198529" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807665">AndyMomTom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I never say that I hate any fragrance, but I cannot STAND this perfume, at least on my skin and on tester strips. It smells musty and mildewy or like clothes that dried damp.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2198529"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2198529#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cavaleiro de Ta&ccedil;as"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2151751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cavaleiro de Ta&ccedil;as" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2151751">Cavaleiro de Ta&ccedil;as</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 15:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the air I smell fresh aromatic pepper enveloped in powdery florals. <br />
Closer to the skin the pepper opening is ascetic, evoking austerity; this is a stiff ceremony or a religious procession. No citruses at the top, but a spicy aromatic smell, almost minty but more like smelling a nearby wormwood bush. This sensation alongside the iris and musk is central to the wearing experience, the black pepper and the sweet/powdery notes together can come off as cheap but the musk and sandalwood makes this enjoyable for me. The dry down leans sweet depending on the circumstances with the fresh core rarely being absent. I cant pin this down, it always smells different from my last wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2198341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2198341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ronanthelibrarian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573798"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1573798.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ronanthelibrarian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573798">Ronanthelibrarian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean summer linen vibes. The black pepper gives a distinctive semi-aromatic aura to the orange blossom, and I wouldnt have guessed it as a note if I didnt already know it was in there. The iris provides a texture between chalky and powdery, striking just the right balance. Surprising longevity in my skin, with a pleasant and unobtrusive sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2196293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2196293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yunusemre_u"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1860105"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1860105.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yunusemre_u" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); Ben narenciye notas sevmiyorum bunu anladm. Paranz boa harcamayn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2195807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2195807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194878" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Prestigious_Fragrances"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Prestigious_Fragrances" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1036146">Prestigious_Fragrances</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would say this offering is definitely unisex due to the sweet florals and musk used; slightly leans masculine at 60% - 40-%. Very safe and nice smelling. This will not offend anyone and is a a safe dumb reach. The bottle is lovely and with that being said, I think this would make a fantastic groom or bride wedding scent. Not bottle worthy for me due to the price and I like a little more depth with my fresh fragrances. Decent performance and good ingredients so therefore I would say this deserves a 7/10 for marks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2194878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2194878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189809" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AuGusto87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1952071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1952071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AuGusto87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189809ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189809" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); I like this a lot but Ganymede for me iss much more interesting and develops beautifullyy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2189809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2189809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187320" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HugoSlime"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HugoSlime" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587482">HugoSlime</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The comments are encouraging me to revisit this fragrance. I even got bored of wearing it to the gym. It's like a premium deodorant. Lynx for grown ups</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2187320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2187320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184373" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gamecocks1!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gamecocks1!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-11784.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11784.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend"title="Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087">Gamecocks1!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 19:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love galloway I get a bubble gum vibe off of it. I think pdm did a wonderful job putting this together. Love how the Orange Blossom and Iris mix together here </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2184373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2184373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178866" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentfather"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2072201.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentfather" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178866ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178866" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072201">Scentfather</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 10:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eternal on clothes.  Best PDM.  Not your standard white musk scent.  The iris leans more on the orris root side, earthier and less powdery.  (Similar to FN Fabulous orris).  If you dont like FN fabulous because of that punchy, slight gasoline orris, you wont like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2178866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2178866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175249" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UnbelievablyScently"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258957"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258957.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UnbelievablyScently" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Mugler-Cologne-708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mugler Cologne"title="Mugler Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258957">UnbelievablyScently</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 00:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's something off with Galloway, if I had to a fragrance, I would compare to Gentleman Givenchy Cologne which has a similar scent profile, but Givenchy actually comes off really fresh &amp; spicy. I'm sorry &amp; not sorry, there is nothing fresh or clean about Galloway, something was over done, I can't quite put my finger on it. It smells linear from the moment you spray it to the end (with the same vomit inducing scent).<br />
<br />
It's possible that I have received a spoiled bottle, but who knows.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2175249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2175249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
