padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2121364">StarA2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very luxurious fragrance that exudes masculinity from Parfums de Marly... excellence for summer... for a self-confident man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2164341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2164341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timsmellsg00d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="timsmellsg00d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196">timsmellsg00d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 08:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy citrus and musky florals. A lot of people tend to talk about the big 3 freshies from PDM those being Sedley, Percival, and Greenley but, I think this is so great and underrated. This is clean, fresh, and simple but, a lot of people do hate it for that. Many people expect something groundbreaking and ultra unique because it is PDM but, I think niche fragrance snobs need to remember that not everything needs to be a super challenging blend. This is a very nice and simple fragrance that has high quality ingredients. The opening is a little challenging with the pepper and citrus combo that PDM has done horribly wrong before with fragrances like Kalan but this is miles better than the Kalan opening, and it dries to a clean musky floral scent. I think the beauty of this fragrance is in the simplicity and quality. I get 8 hours of longevity and decent projection.<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Performance: 8/10<br />
Price: 7/10<br />
Overall: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2161936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2161936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2161449" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="davidramos555"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1441264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="davidramos555" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Perfect-Oud-39219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perfect Oud"title="Perfect Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2161449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2161449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1441264">davidramos555</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-19">05/19/24 19:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Plainly put, thumbs up in my book. Citrusy, peppery, musky with a hint of sweetness, almost vanilla bean like from the amber in the base. Very clean, very classy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2161449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2161449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ayywolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1946008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ayywolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946008">ayywolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had high hopes for this one. I ordered a 10 ml decant of it and boy am I glad I didn't buy a full bottle.<br />
It's not that it's bad, it's just nothing spectacular. On my skin, I get 0 iris and there is a very prominent amber note throughout. It opens with lively citruses and I get a lot of pepper, then it heads into this clean, neroli-amber smell which is very masculine in my opinion. It's not as summery as I thought it would be and performance on it is mediocre in my experience. It smells good quality, but I was really hoping that this would be a neroli, iris and citrus focused fragrance instead of a massive spicy amber bomb. Good for what it is, but for me personally, it's not nearly as summer-friendly as I hoped.<br />
Overall, it's a nice fragrance, if you like Azzaro Chrome Pure, you'll probably like this one too (it's the only fragrance I can associate it with). Nothing mind-blowing, but good PDM quality.<br />
6/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2156731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2156731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="selalami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2130744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="selalami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2130744">selalami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is pretty strong with the citrus which I like, but as it dries down you get a lot of musk and pepper. Unfortunately the pepper gives me a headache which sucks because I like the smell. It's very clean, the white bottle makes sense. Professional, clean scent, can't really go wrong.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2153947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2153947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Love this stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2152512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2152512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Now I'm awaiting my bottle of Galloway to arrive, perfect as the spring is starting to inject some life into Stockholm, haha!<br />
Being such a fresh, open and versatile scent I wonder how it layers...does anyone from our community any experience from the scent as a base to;<br />
"Layton"<br />
"Percival"<br />
"Green Irish Tweed"<br />
"Himalaya"<br />
to the long shot "Oud Wood" or any other fragrances, either as a base or a top?<br />
Thank you in advance and have a nice spring!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2138927"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2138927#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; PdM has some heavy hitters with beautiful complexity and big performance. This just lacks much of an identity to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2137976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2137976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2134957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134957" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sh83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1891584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sh83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Silver-53400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Silver"title="Gentle Fluidity Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); Might just be me but each time I try this the muskiness seems overbearing and makes me self-conscious so I wash it off. If that note was dialed down this would probably be one of my favorite Spring scents.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Man, I don't know what happened in the last few days since I tried this but wearing it again today and it's perfect. Classic casual gentleman scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2134957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2134957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118470" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WyattEngland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1426425"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1426425.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WyattEngland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Steamed-Rainbow-79740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Steamed Rainbow"title="Steamed Rainbow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1426425">WyattEngland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 14:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I am honest, this smells like a spicy aftershave. Not worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2118470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2118470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118388" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afternoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815424.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="afternoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815424">afternoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I write and inhale the aroma, it's strongly reminiscent of shaving foam, the blue gel kind. Despite this, the scent possesses more depth and character; however, the initial few minutes are dominated by a heavy dose of spicy citrus notes.<br />
<br />
It's one of those scents that, when melded with the wearer's skin, exudes a comforting, masculine, and clean aura. I find myself yearning to be embraced by the wearer rather than to wear it myself! If it weren't for its steep price tag, I'd have already secured a bottle immediately.<br />
<br />
Suitable for summer and spring, day or nightit's truly versatile in my opinion. I find myself yearning to hold my partner close and inhale the scent from his pulse points. While it initially resembled shaving cream, that association completely dissipates by the end. It's akin to the dilemma of 'do I want to be with her or be her,' only in this case, it's 'do I want to wear this or have it on my partner.'</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2118388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2118388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2117440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2117440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ellis_negron"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657847"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1657847.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ellis_negron" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2117440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2117440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657847">ellis_negron</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-07">04/07/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean and rich. Very bright and musky. I really like it, projection time is really great too. Dries down very powdery fresh and spicy. 8/10, would be more but the price is crazy for what it is. Honestly perfect for brunches lunches. Maybe a bit too bright for special events and dinners unless its very warm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2117440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2117440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113044" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113044ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113044" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); <br />
To me, it smells like something a Prince from the old British Empire would wear, its royal, classy, sophisticated, as though you were walking around the gardens of a castle in the middle of spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This sleeper fragrance exudes a timeless charm that effortlessly captivates the senses. One of my ALL-TIME favorite spring/summer fragrances for its versatility and amazing scents!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2108912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2108912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106324" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="punkb0nes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="punkb0nes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-for-Men-Eau-de-Parfum-31909.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31909.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"title="The One for Men Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001024">punkb0nes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a decant with another order. It's not a bad scent, but maybe not for me. I'm a huge fan of Percival and Layton, but this one has something about it I'm not a huge fan of. Citrus is nice, but the muskiness of it isn't my cup of tea. You do get more pepper and wood on the drydown but the opening is very synthetic smelling. It's definitely clean smelling as well<br />
<br />
*Update 4/25/24*: I have fallen in love with this scent. So fresh and clean, perfect for spring, just bought a full bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2106324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2106324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loumari/Porthole-83054.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83054.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Porthole"title="Porthole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-26">03/26/24 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tend to go for the cold-weather offerings from PDM - love the Exclusifs and others there, and have not really dedicated much of my attention to the fresher options - EXCEPT Galloway.<br />
 Oh, have mercy! This is clean, sharp, fresh, and WHITE. Gives a perfumed aura for many hours into its wear!<br />
 On my skin, very good performance. Smooth, and in contrast with that sharpness I've previously referred to, a few minutes into the fragrance, you can already pickup some of the base-heavy nuances. I love the experience this one brings - no idea what comparisons are being made here, all I know it's nothing like Chrome Pure (which I also love).<br />
 Leans masculine to me, and at discounters, quite a good price for what I got. My 125ml was ~$130.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2105042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2105042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrewDrew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1856565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrewDrew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormonde-Jayne/Montabaco-Cuba-87693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Montabaco Cuba"title="Montabaco Cuba"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1856565">DrewDrew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 11:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just smells like Versace Pour Homme but better quality. Much more than any of the others in the "This perfume reminds me of" category so if you like Versace Pour Homme, you would love this. Price isn't that bad at all on discounters. That said, I hate this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2087220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2087220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083983" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RefaEDT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2042539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RefaEDT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-276.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.276.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One"title="CK One"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042539">RefaEDT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 07:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance embodies a sensation akin to emerging from a shower adorned with the finest bathing essentials, exuding a crisp, sharp freshness that captivates the senses.<br />
<br />
Its performance is exceptional, ensuring that its projection and sillage leave a lasting impression. Personally, I adore the subtle interplay of iris and musky undertones, adding depth to its allure.<br />
<br />
Best PdM for summer in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2083983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2083983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nicholasmendez13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nicholasmendez13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); Great signature scent for any age.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2060419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2060419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044548" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044548" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ariete76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1190594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ariete76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190594">Ariete76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 07:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect unisex powdery, initially very fresh citrus fruits and pepper to make it interesting and joyful, then in the dry down its true powdery, clean soul comes out, smell of freshly collected laundry, perfect in every season and location, both work and informal, it is one of those powdery scents that I appreciate even though I don't like the genre because it remains clean without being suffocating and dusty</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thee_argus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thee_argus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2044260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2044260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fredglib"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fredglib" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231701">fredglib</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 04:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very underrated fragrance. A real masterpiece. Very masculine in my opinion, the musk and citrus is blended perfectly. <br />
I would wear this during summer/spring. Performance is also great despite being a fresh scent. Maybe slightly overpriced but I think it's worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2034419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2034419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025356" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2025356" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2025356ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2025356" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#532 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
I've made clear I love Parfums de Marley as a fragrance house. I've also made clear I'd almost wear cat poo if it had an iris note. I don't know why iris does it for me, but it always does it for me. Galloway has a lot of the right stuff, plus iris, making it for me maybe the nicest citrus freshie ever, most especially as it doesn't have a strong bergamot note, a note that I love but which always gives me a runny nose, or I'd be wearing one of the similars people have mentioned, most of which I've had and ended up giving away. And none of those have an iris note.(one reviewer compared this to Egoiste Platinum and Armaf Legasi. I have both. Not even close.)<br />
<br />
This is absolutely great for the beach or the gym or any causal day wear. Office? I guess it depends on how formal and what level you're at, but not for me. It's a really simple scent that's clean and fresh.  Absolutely impossible that it will offend anyone in any setting and it hangs on till lunch and dinner which few citrus freshies do. But damn it's pricey. Nevertheless, come warmer weather I may still bite the bullet and buy a bottle of this for the Summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2025356"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2025356#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018575" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darokes85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293316.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darokes85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Silver-53400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Silver"title="Gentle Fluidity Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293316">Darokes85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get why people say its boring and generic, especially if youre someone that enjoys bold and unique fragrances. I get why people may expect more from PDM considering its a niche house selling fragrances at luxury price points. But can we normalize niche fragrance houses creating high quality well blended simple fragrances without dismissal. Sure you can find a cheaper alternative of this DNA but you get what you pay for a cheap synthetic smelling composition. Galloway may smell basic, boring, and generic but no one can criticize the high quality this fragrance possesses. We all love a bold and unique, statement making fragrance but we all need a simple understated fragrance in our collection for those boring simple everyday moments in our lives. Like grocery shopping, doctors appointments, going to school or the gym etc. Surely you cant expect to show up EVERYWHERE wearing oud, spicy, gourmand compositions. Thats tacky and obnoxious. Balance out your collection with a high quality clean, simple and basic scent like Galloway. <br />
<br />
It smells like crisp cleanliness. A very balanced and smooth citrus, musk and wood combo with a spicy opening. Its not your typical clean fragrance but a luxurious clean scent. Smells like someone who bathes using the most exclusive and expensive bath products on the market and is very healthy and rich . Smells like a Doctor on their off time. Someone whos better than most people but is still pleasant and humble for the sake of their career and reputation. Smells like someone who smells great NATURALLY like they smell amazing without wearing a fragrance, just soap and water, deodorant and clean laundered clothes. <br />
<br />
Performance is great too lasting about 6 to 8 hours with a nice projection a little bit south of 2 feet. Leaves a really nice crisp but warm clean musky sillage. Also 100% genderless. The opening is a tad bit off putting with the spicy pepper, but it fades and blends in with the other notes beautifully mere minutes after spraying. <br />
<br />
TLDR: dont be that insufferable fragrance snob who cant enjoy or at least appreciate a very nice well made simple fragrance. Galloway is a great option if you want to smell clean and luxurious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2018575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2018575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006016" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hiteshvs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hiteshvs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745812">hiteshvs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 06:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a super mild version of Channel Platunum Egoist / Armaf Legasi. No doubt about it and I am really surprised how no one has commented about it at all, amongst all the reviews. Also, none of the youtube reviewers have highlighted this.I blind bought this and was dissappointed as it offers nothing unique. The price just dosen't justify this scent at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2006016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2006016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005238" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005238" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Norathar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Norathar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Dragonfly-Edition-2021-67999.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67999.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dragonfly Edition 2021"title="Dragonfly Edition 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005238ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005238" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740820">Norathar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Generically masculine fresh scent. Citrus and musk notes are prominent, it lasts on skin forever after projection has faded, pleasant, but too masculine for me personally and not worth the price for the scent, imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2005238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2005238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002090" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yohanes27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1895428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yohanes27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Amber-Oud-Tobacco-Edition-55791.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55791.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Oud Tobacco Edition"title="Amber Oud Tobacco Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1895428">Yohanes27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells a lot like Lalique White, maybe 90 to 95 percent similarity but with slightly longer longevity.<br />
Most people won't be able to tell the difference, even side by side I hardly tell any difference.<br />
Just buy the Lalique, its the original, cost less than 20% of this, you can overspray away and buy 5x the fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2002090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2002090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
