padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989952" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DapperDon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DapperDon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989952ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989952" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689">DapperDon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No no no no no. Feminine leanings Iris musk scent. Yes, like a newly constructed room, but with the windows open on a sunny day and a vase of purple florals. <br />
Iris, chalk, violet &amp; orange blossom.<br />
A white shirt fragrance for spring time. No pepper. Lite citrus dies off in 15min vaguely reminiscent of a cleaning product. Smells more like a perfume.<br />
Not surprised I dont really like this, but was worth a try. Iris is not my thing </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1989952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1989952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salohcin2148"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salohcin2148" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Basso-75927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Basso"title="Basso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415">Salohcin2148</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 14:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got my bottle.....Call me crazy but this is my favorite freshie out of the PDM house. At discounters this is worth every damn penny. Bight citrus opening, transitions to something creamy smooth and almost pillowy, peppery touches, with a dash of Iris that doesn't add a powdery feeling (thank god) and fades into a slight amber on the deep dry down. Projects enough to keep it classy and lasts all day (8+ hours on skin and longer on clothing). God I cant believe I slept on this. I loved me some Sedley but it's taken a back seat to this juice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1989214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1989214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978998" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SharkMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1854895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SharkMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1854895">SharkMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 14:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is this worth 200 plus dollars? no. But it is amazing and can be worn for anything anywhere. Glad I picked it up</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1978998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1978998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salohcin2148"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479415.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salohcin2148" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Basso-75927.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75927.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Basso"title="Basso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479415">Salohcin2148</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 17:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First wearing and Im between like and love with this one. Smells fresh, slightly creamy and classy. I get a little bit of Xerjoff Uden with no booze. I also get something that smells like freshly Ironed clothes, not h24 but it did come to mind for a second but this is totally different then both of those scents. You can feel the pepper in the first hours or so but it's not bad. I have a few more wears in this sample so I will come back but I can say this is full bottle worthy. Lasts on skin for 8 hours, projects for 2 of so then calms as time goes on. If you're looking for an elevated work fresh clean scent give this a try.<br />
<br />
Edit: What everyone says is true, this is a sleeper. Not the most beast mode but it projects for a few hours and stays on skin for ages. Since it focuses on musks I can see why some people don't get along as musk can act differently from person to person, but for me this is perfect. This is in the same vein of fragrance that doesn't offend, clean crisp citrus, laundry, white shirt scent. The color of the bottle kinda portrays the juice inside. For me at this point in my fragrance journey Im most into the easy going clean fragrances. For some reason when I wear these I have women stopping me to tell me how amazing I smell. Im wear fragrance for myself and lean toward uplifting scents which is what this is. I own a bottle of Nishae Nefs and that's for a nice dinner and going out with my wife. Everywhere in between I wear Fresh uplifting scents and this is right up my alley. Full bottle worthy for me for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1964662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1964662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964207" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Batman10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1850386"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Batman10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1850386">Batman10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fresh, mass appealing everyday scent. might seem like designer to some but to me, it has that elevated level of royalty or suave  that you'd expect from a niche fragrance, don't know if its a placebo affect but smells nice, cant go wrong,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1964207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1964207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781669">R.diggity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favorite citrus musk ever.  The citrus is strong in the opening, but settles perfectly once the powdery iris pops up.  ***Edit:  the Iris is closer to orris root than actually Iris***  The amber notes keep the white musk from being to 80s drier sheet Aunt Sheila.  The balance of masc-fem is absolutely gorgeous.  Any occasion/event.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1946734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1946734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859593">RobKY</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-28">09/28/23 09:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you get the impression that this fragrance is too peppery/spicy then just pull your nose away from your skin and smell it in the air, as this is what others will experience, and you will find that the scent remains clean and fresh throughout.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1939449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1939449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="roh.ans"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1823631.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="roh.ans" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23271.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Galloway"title="Galloway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823631">roh.ans</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My new favorite fragrance. To start off, this is a BEAST in longevity, on my skin it lasted 18 hours (some others say it doesn't last long, however). It's a great freshie, which in my opinion can be worn by any age group, and the pepper note isn't too prominent like some people think. Heavy on the citrus while also being unique and versatile. Criminally underrated, and it pulls compliments amazingly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1933731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1933731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923595" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blitzen18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1702117.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blitzen18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702117">Blitzen18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 08:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Info: I get all my fragrances from authorised retaliers or directly from the brand, my reviews can also be of help to those who maybe don t know they got a fake and start to argue about poor performance.<br />
<br />
I m just amazed by this fragrance.<br />
First time i smelled it i remember i got 2 samples from PDM 1 Galloway and 1 Greenley(i smelled Greenley first i was really amazed by the green apple note however i won t say more about greenley cause i didn t get a whole bottle to test but i got Galloway) so when smelled Galloway i was like" this smells special, there is something about it " i couldn't tell what from the start so after i bought a bottle and i tested i understood that i could smell the combination of iris and orange blossom from the begging and that was what made me think there is something special about this fragrance.<br />
<br />
To my nose that pepper mixes from the begging with the floral notes from the middle and gives me that floral-peppery with a little citrus scent that to my nose smells special.<br />
<br />
The performance is very good for me even though i my nose is not very helpfull in that regard, i have lots of friends, females especialy, and when we meet at the gym(i work at the gym) they are not shy to tell me i smell good, so that is my indicator of how long a fragrance lasts on me :)) 1 time i got a compliment after about 10 hours of wearing the fragrance, but most of the times i get the compliments in those firsts 7-8 hours.<br />
<br />
Personal tip: i like to put Galloway and then put a layer of Creed Green Irish Tweed,  what i like about this is that it gives to Galloway scent a very mature green vibe<br />
<br />
My personal rantings are <br />
Scent 10/10 ( just because i find that combination of notes very special )<br />
Longevity 9/10 ( only because i like a fragrance longevity to be over 10 hours since to my lifestyle i m out all day and i could apply a fragrance once per day)<br />
Projection 7-8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1923595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1923595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rmnnnnn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804742"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1804742.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rmnnnnn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804742">rmnnnnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 00:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fresh musky uplifting gentle elegant scent. Imagine waking up on a sunny sunday morning during summer, heading to get some good breakfast. This is what Id wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1923386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1923386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920080" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920080" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lukasssss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lukasssss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920080ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920080" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657553">Lukasssss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 04:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just by sniffing the atomizer, I can tell that it is a musky fragrance. The opening has a big pepper blast accompanied with citrus and floral notes. As the fragrance progresses, the emphasis shifts more towards the florals and the clean musk note with something slightly sweet in the background. If you want to smell clean, this is an excellent choice. It smells like clean white bedsheets drying outside in the wind. Personally, I dont think it is that interesting. The house of PDM has a lot more exciting fragrances than Galloway to offer. 6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1920080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1920080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916016" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DichterundDenker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1783271.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DichterundDenker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); Galloway is a peppery mess. The iris saves the scent a bit, but overall it's a rather mediocre EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1916016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1916016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915524" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="belleofnewyork"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/443752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.443752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="belleofnewyork" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/443752">belleofnewyork</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this as a sample in a PDM order. The opening is very peppery, it almost overshadows the citrus to me. The middle and drydown are where Galloway really shines.  This turns into a scent that's  so familiar and nostalgic to me. It took me a bit to place it, but it reminds me of Calvin Klein Crave. It has a great early aughts smell to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1915524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1915524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820087">Gamecocks1!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love galloway I live Galloway my favorite</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1914634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1914634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hancho03"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823878"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1823878.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hancho03" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823878">Hancho03</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-27">08/27/23 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ahh Galloway. Easily the most underrated gem from the House of PDM.<br />
<br />
This is Fresh, and the uplifting kinda fresh. The citruses from the opening are bright, but not sharp (I mostly get orange zest). The pepper is there, but in the background to give a sorta spiciness.<br />
<br />
Opening doesnt last long, because after a half hour or so this develops into a clean floral musky scent. The orange blossom definitely plays the biggest roll here and is finely complimented by the musks they use here. For such a floral scent this definitely leans masculine in the best way. <br />
<br />
I love how the freshness here just cuts through the air, its like a mountain breeze. Projects beautifully on a hot day like the ones here in Arizona. Very versatile, I even wear this one to the gym, but its definitely got way more class than that. Compliments galore. A summer staple for me, day or night.<br />
<br />
8/10 <br />
<br />
Is this a must buy, no. But is it a must try, yup.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1912606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1912606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its more unique and smells really nice. <br />
For me best freshie from the house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1908276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1908276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a weird one, I can't recommend it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1902889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1902889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1901081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1901081" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Danyol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1643732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Danyol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Water-7510.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7510.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Water"title="Royal Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1901081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1901081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1643732">Danyol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-13">08/13/23 05:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really fresh and different from the regular blue freshies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1901081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1901081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1898482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1898482" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1898482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1898482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-10">08/10/23 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@jbozz - It's not just you, I know exactly what you're talking about. It's not so much the smell as the sensation. It's like smelling cleaned clothes that are drying on a hot radiator, that's the only way I can explain it. I was in a shop with a heater on when I was smelling it, and I thought the heater was giving me that sensation, then I smelled it again outside and got the same thing. Very strange. Not a bad fragrance at all, smells nice enough, but that strange sensation it gives off (to me at least) put me off it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1898482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1898482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1885660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1885660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 16:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like Galloway but it has something off-putting to me almost like a burnt accord. Maybe its the pepper? For some reason it reminds me of a hot soldering iron or some kind of electrical burning smell which I know is weird but thats what I get from this particular note. If only that wasnt in there I feel it would be so much better, as some of the wafts I got were almost pleasant, but as it is this stuff is NOT blind buy worthy at all! Definitely test it on your skin first. I got roughly the same smell on a test strip. I dont see this pulling compliments, but hey who knows, maybe its a skin chemistry thing. All that said, it did last a good while on my skin roughly 5-6 hours. But personally I would easily choose Sedley, Percival or Greenley any day over this one. No offense to anyone who enjoys this one but its definitely not my cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1881667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1881667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Galloway beats Greenley, thats for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1867570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1867570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863417" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863417" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kustomeyez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kustomeyez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863417ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863417" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528791">Kustomeyez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-24">06/24/23 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>UPDATED discovery .. upon reading another review, comparing the dry down off this to Terrible Teddy by the house of Penhaligons is spot on! I almost purchased TT until I read that review and sprayed myself with Galloway looking for the similar vibe..&amp; it is there, I couldnt figure out what it was about TT that felt so unmistakably familiar, now I know.!!! And so do you.. Both Amazing scents but I say the PDM has a better overall scent profile. Something in the opening of TT is slightly off putting for the first hour to me, but then it takes a turn and heads down the PDM path which is gorgeous. Now on to my initial review of Galloway here <br />
<br />
 This one right here to me, is. As if you took Sedley and Greenley put em in a room to procreate, and some time later out pops baby Galloway.  Now to me Galloway is the naked iteration of both. Sedley and Greenley have a similar back bone, and that back bone is Galloway. Its as if you stripped what makes Greenley Greenley and makes Sedley , Sedley youd end up with Galloway which Galloway itself, is the similarity between the other 2 .. if you ask me   ,, I love em All  not too strong but not too weak either. Good quality juice. Financial advisory warning  Never pay full Retail. , wait for a deal on jomashop and then pull the trigger. Ohh, and the references to photo copy machine smell, its not in a bad way, its quite pleasant, and the references to the pepper note is surely not off putting, to me this kinda has a slight ever so slight Burberry Hero vibe like a very fresh spicy cedar scent.  Imma try layering this with creed silver mountain water and see what kinda heaven on earth scent it produces. !!! So sipN Sniff what ever makes you happy.. YOLO ohhh wait ,, forgot to mention the Iris ,,, yea its detectable to me, kinda plays into givenchy gentleman boise territory or however you say and spell boise .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1863417"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1863417#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1860541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
