padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1830660" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1830660ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1830660" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-11">05/11/23 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore musk fragrances, orange blossom and citruses, this is a mess. This smells like a poor made fragrance with cheap musk. The clash of them all made me so upset because I wanted a rich musk with sweetness from the orange blossom and citruses to keep it airy. This comes off as harsh, heavy and just poorly blended. To the comment that this smells like Dunder Mifflin, the office would smell like Andy's Roger Federer for men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1830660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1830660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1823186" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Realest Rater 47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740776"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740776.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Realest Rater 47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1823186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1823186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740776">Realest Rater 47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(edit: i did get a real bottle, bro tripping)<br />
This is the niche version of burberry touch, smell and youll know what i mean<br />
<br />
Clean, musky, the musk almost comes across smoky, the citrus and florals are more prominent in the opening and on paper/fabric, when sprayed on the skin it becomes more musky and ambery.<br />
<br />
Smells luxuriously clean. <br />
<br />
Great longevity but medium projection.<br />
<br />
Best for spring summer fall day to day wear.<br />
<br />
good warm weather signature imo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1823186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1823186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="qluugd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="qluugd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720535">qluugd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-27">04/27/23 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As much as I wanted to like this as I loved all the other PDMs I've had, I just don't really care for it. Soapy clean for sure, I can't deny that, but it is just really simple. I just think its not up to par with the other more complex fragrances of the house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1819387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1819387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1807945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1807945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ty/dc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ty/dc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1807945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1807945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327793">Ty/dc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-13">04/13/23 12:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I initially overlooked Galloway for PDMs more richer darker scents more suited to the colder months. Now that summer is approaching I decided to give it a go and to my surprise this is a lovely fresh scent perfect for the summertime.<br />
<br />
Its not particularly complex but the pepper, Iris, citruses, orange blossom and musk all perfectly blend together creating a beautiful scent profile. I dont really pick up any amber notes but it could be there supporting the whole composition.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1807945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1807945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1807412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1807412" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bthompson2388"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1540926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bthompson2388" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1807412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1807412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540926">Bthompson2388</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-12">04/12/23 20:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive worn this the past couple of days since weve had some warmer weather. I think it smells great! Its unique and lasts an entire work day. I currently have a decant, but Im really considering buying a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1807412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1807412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1806521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1806521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mortekai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1686853.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mortekai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Eau-Intense-81839.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81839.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense"title="Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1806521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1806521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686853">Mortekai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-11">04/11/23 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin Galloway pushes very, very citrusy in the opening with a bit of that orange blossom dabbed in for the first hour, and fades away in the second hour, while the musk lingers. The mix of citrus and orange blossom are definitely an interesting, round scent, not sharp at all. In fact, Galloway is a very round, dull (not in a bad way) feeling scent from start to finish, and a very interesting and intriguing scent. I only get a very faint bit of iris, if any, but the musk stays with you throughout the day. It's surprisingly fresh, and the amber starts to push through on the back end after the top notes fade out, beautifully mixing in with the musk.<br />
<br />
This is a great scent that you can dress up or down without any issue. It's much more unique than some other summer/spring offerings such as Sedley or Percival. While most people would be able to pick out the scents of the others, this has a bit of mystery to it for the general public without developed noses.<br />
<br />
This fragrance easily lasted me 10 hours. First 2 hours have good projection of about an arms length, but it will become a close scent bubble after. Overall a lovely spring fragrance, and I would wear it in the summer in lower heat, as I think there are others that suit high heat summers a bit better. This is a 10/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1806521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1806521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802898" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dayonee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1647189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dayonee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647189">dayonee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initially tested this on a strip and really liked the citrusy opening. Landed myself a bottle yesterday and tried it on skin. Much peppery that I expected. It hovers the line of being a bit too much for me but never crosses. Musky drydown but very softly done. Classy warm weather scent; more of a button down or a polo shirt than a t-shirt. Looking forward to wearing this in a warmer weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1802898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1802898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799526" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NotAnEqualizer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NotAnEqualizer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Haltane-70776.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70776.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Haltane"title="Haltane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437125">NotAnEqualizer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is difficult to describe, so I'll probably confuse some people.<br />
<br />
My first impression after spraying is that there's a clean, bright smokiness. I've heard some people describe this as similar to Dior Fahrenheit, and this was the first thing that came to mind even though I didn't expect it. It's only in the opening, though. It'll go away; it's not necessarily a bad thing either.<br />
<br />
The iris is barely present. It's like Prada L'Homme, but dialed down. Not a bad thing, it's just a bit different.<br />
<br />
This fragrance does something that all my Parfums de Marly fragrances do at the end of the day, when the scent has lived its life and turns into a skin scent late at night. They all have a bar soap smell, which is actually really good. I like smelling clean. However, Galloway brings it to the forefront and dials it up. Some people describe this as freshly cleaned laundry, and I can agree with that as well.<br />
<br />
It also has the same "cooling" effect that you get from Parfums de Marly Pegasus and Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree. I really like it when perfumers achieve this in summer fragrances. <br />
<br />
In the drydown, the musk is quite prominent in a good way. This is definitely a masculine scent. <br />
<br />
I barely pick up the citrus in this scent. It's faint. This isn't a bad thing; I think it's deliberate. There's plenty of citrus freshies for the summer to pick from, so I think this is on purpose to be a bit different.<br />
<br />
The scent profile is good overall. Very inoffensive and versatile.  You could wear this with gym shorts. There's nothing fancy about this except the quality of the fragrance, which is great like all the Parfums de Marly fragrances I've tried. <br />
<br />
This a really good fragrance for very hot and humid climates. It's not sexy; it's just clean and classy. It smells like you just got out of the shower and washed yourself with bar soap, or like freshly shampooed hair, and then sprinkle in tiny bit of Prada L'Homme but in an upscale Parfums de Marly way. Then in the drydown, I also get something reminiscent to Pengaligon Terrible Teddy, but lighter.<br />
<br />
As I said, this scent is difficult to describe. I really like it.<br />
<br />
Edit: Day 2 of wearing this, I can say the drydown reminds me of the citrusy herbalness of Acqua di Gio EDP, but with the added soap and freshness and a tiny bit of iris. I'm loving it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1799526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1799526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1775953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1775953" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michelle12345678"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michelle12345678" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Gold-70015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold +"title="Gold +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1775953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1775953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935">Michelle12345678</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-05">03/05/23 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is nice. But the drydown is generic. You will be chasing those opening notes, and the drydown is pleasant, but nothing special and definitely not something worth this price. I will test again, but on 03/05/23 these are my impressions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1775953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1775953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1772877" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1772877" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ilikewhatilike"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516720.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ilikewhatilike" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1772877ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1772877" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516720">Ilikewhatilike</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-02">03/02/23 04:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Big fan (both I like it, and in the fact that this frag goes perfectly with summer). <br />
<br />
Sophisticated, quality, perfectly blended, modern, wealthy  I could go on as long as it projects (which is a long long time). <br />
<br />
Just has everything. Iris / musk / citrus for the elegance and lasting freshness and some prominent black pepper cracked in for balance and an interesting pop. <br />
<br />
Compliment getter if thats what you need, chic forcefield if thats what you want.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1772877"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1772877#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1770387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1770387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sophia97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sophia97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Bright-Crystal-Absolu-21547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bright Crystal Absolu"title="Bright Crystal Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1770387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1770387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670870">Sophia97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-27">02/27/23 03:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply remarkable, I hardly find fragrances like these now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1770387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1770387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1763170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1763170" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yehoshua@me"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.656517.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yehoshua@me" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1763170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1763170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656517">Yehoshua@me</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-18">02/18/23 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Exquisite Pepper with Orange Blossom in the background. The Iris is barely noticeable together with the amber &amp; woody sweet ambergris on dry down is ethereal. PDMG has something that most dont detect and is a soft smoky fresh leather accord throughout except on the the dry down where the sweet ambergris vibe lives..5 out of 5 frag imho. stellar performance  8-10 hrs of healthy performance after that a skin scent that can last past to the 12hr+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1763170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1763170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1739252" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evertonnick3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1502868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="evertonnick3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Isola-Blu-80177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Isola Blu"title="Isola Blu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1739252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1739252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502868">evertonnick3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-20">01/20/23 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a 5 ml decant of Galloway and This is one of the most interesting fragrances Ive ever smelled but in the same way as Santal 33 by Le Labo. (I love Santal 33 by the way). At the opening when I smelled this for the first time I did NOT like it. I was shocked that Parfum de Marly put something like this out. But after letting it sit I was like eh its not that bad. An hour or two later I thought it was actually pretty good. Would I buy a full bottle of this? No. Not at all. But its not a bad fragrance, but for the money Id go elsewhere. Im going to give it a few more wearings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1739252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1739252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1719065" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1719065" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1719065ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1719065" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-28">12/28/22 06:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Uhm.. Galloway. You are so musky!<br />
<br />
I own, newer batch of this one and this also reduce concentration by 4% as well.<br />
<br />
I think Galloway make difference and unique enough on it own. Why?<br />
<br />
They Amp the musk to the max, feels almost animalic, nature of animalic smell is they are so punchy, when they also add the pepper. The bring the punch to the extreme so every get notice what are you wearing. This improve noticeability of musk.<br />
<br />
Iris is also play a role here not extreme but enough for sophistication, I smell really up close to notice the plasticky lipsticky type of feel. They add this to make the fragrance more full body.<br />
<br />
Nature of musk, is pleasing but not present.<br />
In Galloway, the amp the supporting note to enhance the musk to the maximum, I found this style of fragrance in Tomford  Lavender Extreme. <br />
That they bring note to support lavender to the max<br />
<br />
So, I would say they make this difference enough not in the way of contemporary compose of White floral  - Musk - Woody.<br />
<br />
Its dried down quite ultimate.<br />
But you will get notice.<br />
<br />
9/10<br />
<br />
Ps. I didnt quite get the strong white floral aspect for this version, only the white floral nuance. I think because of removal of lilial(?) however, I feel this make a plus from who concern about white flower / feminine thing. I suggest you try the newer batch one.<br />
=====<br />
Edit 1 on May 22, 2023<br />
<br />
I am bidding farewell to my little galloway. I was tried to find the position for him in my collection.<br />
 <br />
 cant after I venture into mask fragrance territory.<br />
<br />
After a few wear (5-6 wears), I feel it smell like bleach to me when compare to 1957 by Chanel or even Midnight Musk &amp; Amber from JML.<br />
<br />
The musk is there but it was interrupt by heavy amber base that mostly PDM use so it quite a crash in composition, resulting in Chemical smelling. It is not smooth nor soft n gentle.<br />
<br />
As if we looks for clean or powdery fragrance perspective, Pegasus is much alternative offering from this house as dry down also provide sort of musky feel, you still get the almond and heliotope to play along.<br />
<br />
It is not a bad offering but the house is known for heavy amber fragrance.<br />
<br />
Lets leave this style to others.<br />
<br />
Final verdict 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1719065"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1719065#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718386" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MoonScent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1177883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MoonScent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Corallo-51462.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51462.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Corallo"title="Corallo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177883">MoonScent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-27">12/27/22 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent:<br />
A mix of Amouage reflection man and le male added some Carner Barcelona Tardes with some cumin. The fragrance starts very feminine even for me that like floral and border gender fragrances. As the fragrance develope, the cumin gets stronger. <br />
<br />
Wearability:<br />
 The fragrance is feminine adding a masculine note of Cumin. It is still not comfortable wear for me. I Prefer Amouage reflection man or Carner Tardes in place. I do recommend this or women I think this is a hard perfume to pull off. <br />
<br />
Dry down:<br />
The fragrance gets more masculine in the dry down and is better blended. I really don't know in wish occassions I would wear this one.<br />
<br />
Iris:<br />
The iris here doesn't resemble Dior homme. However it does contribute to making this scent feminine. It got thar old school iris that you find in vintage women perfumes. <br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
The projection and longevity are good... not a monster performer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1718386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1718386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1710370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1710370" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Achilleus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1634312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Achilleus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1710370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1710370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1634312">Achilleus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-16">12/16/22 02:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, I tried this in hopes of its lemony goodness being more pronounced, but it was not the case, it was more smokey than anything, and the smokiness definitely hindered that citrusy scent I desired, it was definitely overpowering it. And as a result, it loses its identity, it becomes something else. It's definitely a more mature scent, if you're young, I'd skip on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1710370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1710370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1707058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Certainly not niche quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1706140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1706140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1706132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1706132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlessandroCB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397826"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1397826.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlessandroCB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orientica-Premium/Oud-Old-Fashioned-96117.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96117.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Old Fashioned"title="Oud Old Fashioned"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1706132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1706132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397826">AlessandroCB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-10">12/10/22 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is beautifully weird, It's like that ugly dude that always has a good looking woman on his side. We don't know how he does it but for sure he knows how to play it. Opening is a totally different fragrance as it past the hours. To me it reminds me of the "Dryness" of the clothing when you take it out from the dryer. Or those who have clean the AC conducts and have smelled the "Burnt" dust from it. Not in the bad way of course, it's a pleasant smell and kinda safe to wear anywhere. I haven't give it a wear, but surely after trying it on my arm and going back and forward I will give it a try with some decants.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1706132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1706132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RileyB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.862747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RileyB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Comme-des-Garcons-Series-4-Cologne-Anbar-3634.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3634.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comme des Garcons Series 4 Cologne : Anbar"title="Comme des Garcons Series 4 Cologne : Anbar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862747">RileyB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-05">11/05/22 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous scent! Galloway is VERY reminiscent of the lemony citrus white pepper dynamics of Lalique White in the top to mid phase especially (which is an excellent scent in its own right btw). The difference from Lalique White being that in the top phase Galloway has quite a strong, dry, chalky cloud of musk that surrounds and embodies the lemon white pepper. The overall effect gives off a very Clean kind of vibe. <br />
The review below that references being like the interior a newly constructed building is very apt. If youve ever smelt the chalkiness of interior drywall being installed and finished, that is very reminiscent of the white chalkiness mixed with the musk in the top to mid of Galloway. It also adds an almost slight newly mixed cement like aspect to that chalkiness, but cement thats already three quarters dry as its only very subtle. All that adding to this being a more masculine leaning scent for sure.<br />
The chalkiness and slight cement like aspects of the musk dissipate as it dries down though, as does some of the peppery aspects. The result is a smooth, soft, lightly spiced pepper lemon musk thats very enjoyable to wear. Quite addicting in fact! Its not a loud scent but certainly makes its presence felt and lasts really well too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1681767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1681767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1680642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1680642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="a.kittilsen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="a.kittilsen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1680642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1680642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013858">a.kittilsen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-04">11/04/22 02:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the first couple of minutes, there is a lot going on. <br />
I smell fahrenheit, Silver Mountain water, green irish tweed etc.<br />
Its hard putting your finger on what exactly it smells like. Ive heard it being compared to freshly printed paper. It has an ink smell that reminds you of Silver Mountain Water, and the rest of the drydown can remind you of fresh warm paper, but ill get to that later.<br />
<br />
While its hard to grasp what it smells like as it reminds you if lots of different fragrances. The thing that stands out the most is the smell of hendricks gin and tonic. <br />
Thats it. Thats what this fragrance smells like.<br />
<br />
When it dries down, it loses just about everything that made it special and fun to begin with. It just smells pleasant at this point.<br />
But it smells so pleasant that you cant really go wrong with it. But at this point, you could really wear any non-offensive fragrance and get the same results or better.<br />
Depending on if you feel this as dry or kinda wet it will smell like freshly printed paper that has cooled for a minute, or if you feel it being more wet it may smell like damp cave/marble/concrete building with water around you.<br />
<br />
Personally, I feel something is missing in the drydown. Its like putting on an amazing show but missing the lead singer.<br />
<br />
And to finish this up, I gave myself another spray to fact-check myself i guess. And yeah. This is magic in a bottle the first hour or two, but then it becomes nothing basically.<br />
<br />
Long post, but this one was hard to describe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1680642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1680642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1680143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1680143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr. Fisk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1552793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr. Fisk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1680143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1680143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); Very pleasant neutral smell.  <br />
<br />
Also, this reminds me of a eau fraiche version of Kalan.  Probably just me lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1680143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1680143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1669874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1669874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshall the Scent Addict"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535806"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1535806.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshall the Scent Addict" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-York-Musk-16394.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16394.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New York Musk"title="New York Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1669874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1669874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535806">Marshall the Scent Addict</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-19">10/19/22 19:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Big PDM fan. This is a safe blind buy. It's a nice clean, Citrus/Musk fragrance that is timeless. Calm and relaxing but also masculine and distinguished - much like Creed's Green Irish Tweed without smelling much like it. It has great performance and longevity. <br />
I can't compare this to any other scent I've smelled (besides the GIT comparison above) - I have heard comparisons to Lalique White but I have never smelled that one. <br />
Great spring/summer scent for home, office, or casual occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1669874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1669874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
