padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460748">Radius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-02">10/02/22 17:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love how Squishyy right below describes it:  "Like a newly constructed building."  Or a house even, with a freshly painted white coat of paint inside.  Lovely description.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1657647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1657647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1651650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1651650" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Squishyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1403891.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Squishyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/BondNo9-com-18133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="BondNo9.com"title="BondNo9.com"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1651650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1651650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1403891">Squishyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-23">09/23/22 22:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I struggle to detect it at all... Maybe something went wrong with my sample, or my skin just has horrible chemistry with this; I'm not sure. It feels like when I wear any Creed, LOL.<br />
<br />
What I do smell, I Freakin' LOVE. This is a hidden gem. It's as clean as an empty, white, newly constructed building and doesn't smell like a dryer sheet. I might add that Galloway is the furthest thing from a situational fragrance. This will work everywhere... always. Kind of a jack of all trades factor going on. Master of none, but oftentimes better than a master of one. This would be such an awesome signature. Anyone who rocks this isn't trying to make a statement. They don't need to. Because they're probably someone fully comfortable with themself. That's Galloway's vibe.<br />
<br />
I'll most likely buy a full bottle soon. I need to do more research regarding this performance, but what the hell... It's not too expensive on discounters, and who doesn't love the look of these bottles?<br />
<br />
UPDATE: I'm not sure what changed, but now I'm getting the performance. It doesn't project super far, but it lasts forever. That will be perfect for some people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1651650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1651650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650642" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Top G Note"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Top G Note" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571740">Top G Note</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-22">09/22/22 11:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SHITFUCK im in love, but too pricy for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1650642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1650642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641805" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="treyabbott"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255904.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="treyabbott" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Patchouli-Blanc-71670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Patchouli Blanc"title="Patchouli Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255904">treyabbott</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-09">09/09/22 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wore this to work yesterday--one of my favorites for the office given that it never offends, it embodies class, it lasts nearly forever, but it isn't boring.<br />
<br />
So I was at work, wearing Galloway, when we received the news that Queen Elizabeth had passed away. I live in DC so I left work a few minutes early, grabbed some flowers, and stopped by the British Embassy on my way home to pay my respects.<br />
<br />
I happened to glance at Galloway's Fragrantica profile today and noticed that it is named after a Scottish racehorse. In retrospect, it seems like it was such a fitting fragrance to wear (unintentionally) in memory of someone whose love of Scotland and racehorses was famous. A sad day, but glad to have made a small scent connection to mark it.<br />
<br />
Never offends, embodies class, lasts nearly forever, but definitely not boring!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1641805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1641805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1637064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1637064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="V.Scent.Orient"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1363028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="V.Scent.Orient" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1637064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1637064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363028">V.Scent.Orient</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-03">09/03/22 02:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>    <br />
<br />
Have you ever visited a water cave before? For you who have or at least seen the footage before please close your eyes and imagine entering it once again. <br />
<br />
When entering one immediately we will feel the cool climate inside the cave surroundings no matter what the temperature outside. The dominant presence of pure fresh water in the air of water cave is what Galloway offers right from the first spray. The portray of a quite and refreshing surroundings vividly comes to mind when wearing it.<br />
<br />
The water is still and calm coherent with character of this fragrance. An excellent fragrance that doesn't need to be breakdown apart for the notes. An olfactory transporting wonder that also works amazingly as a perfume. A rare combination amongst today's creation.<br />
<br />
The soothing yet elegant quality is perfect to be wear in hot weather or whenever in need to feel refreshed with more than just a simple cologne.<br />
<br />
It definitely has inky quality found in Xerjoff Mefisto (if I remember correctly) and Creed Silver Mountain Water. But it is artfully done in a well balanced manner just for the ambiance effects. It last superbly great too for this type of fragrance.<br />
<br />
Thank you for reading and I'm looking forward to share many more to our wonderful community . Wishing everyone a wonderful day <br />
<br />
#vscentorientreview</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1637064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1637064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1636067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1601412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pianogoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493811"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1493811.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pianogoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1601412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1601412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); Id be happy to smell like this in all spring, summer and early autumn. Would be a nice summer evening fragrance and have something less powdery for daytime, dont get me wrong  still very wearable in the day though. <br />
<br />
Better than Sedley in my opinion and second to Percival as a PdM freshie goes. Still to try Greenley so cant compare, yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1601412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1601412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1585875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1585875" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aczwy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1344925.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="aczwy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1585875ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1585875" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344925">aczwy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-16">06/16/22 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ozonic; citrus, a little bit of spice. this reminds me so much of an abercrombie and fitch cologne but more refined and mature.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1585875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1585875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1583811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarkFL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarkFL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1583811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1583811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516750">MarkFL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-13">06/13/22 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this. I havent smelled Lalique White; so Ill say I can in a way id call this a stepchild of GIT, Cool Water, and Silver Mountain Water with a grandparent of Le Labo Another 13. All are similar but all are different. This is masculine and peppery up top with citrus, that goes away quickly. Then it becomes where it stays for hours- peppery musk (the fresh clean musk, not a sweaty musk). This musk can be what they use in Another 13; very comparable musk note. But this is more spicy, but at the same time the amber delivers a little bit of sweetness not in Another 13. Its airy / powdery quality is what makes it a second skin type scent but its much stronger than a skin scent and long lasting. Easy blind reach, gets compliments, and is very distinguished / gentlemenly.<br />
Scent 9/10 Classy, slightly been there done that style reminiscent of cool water but much better performance. <br />
Longevity 8/10 I get 7-8hrs of this; then the musk becomes a complete skin scent but Im ok with a full working day fr any scent.<br />
Performance 8/10 two hours arms length projection with good sillage. Sits closer to skin once it lands in its musk / amber stage but easy to pickup.<br />
Overall 8.5/10 Blind reach, anytime of the year, specifically here in Florida. Will repurchase once my bottle is out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1583811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1583811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830">Arber Cami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Musky, peppery, ozonic smell. Nothing unique and boring to say the least. Opens up peppery and citrusy, dry down is slightly musky, peppery with an ozonic violet leaf/cucumber smell. Pass 100%.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1583008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1583008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578295" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arizona2022 "/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arizona2022 " style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472539">Arizona2022 </b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-05">06/05/22 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Galloway! One of the best and clean scents around. Sweet and sexy; also good silage and longevity. Try it on scent split before you buy, but, it is a beautiful cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1578295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1578295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1565817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1565817" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SleepyDave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SleepyDave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1565817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1565817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476445">SleepyDave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-17">05/17/22 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super dry and a tad bitter citrus scent. In terms of colours it feels really white. This is the second time I wear it, liked it more the first time as this second wear almost gives out a metallic scent due to the powdery and bitter vibe. <br />
<br />
Im not against it, but if I had to pick alternatives for spring/summer wear Id go with Layton for summer nights and Percival for summer days. Carlisle is the real star of the PdM lineup though but is for cooler weather. <br />
<br />
Id personally rank the PdM perfumes Ive tried as follows;<br />
<br />
1. Carlisle (fall/winter and cooler spring evenings)<br />
2. Layton (all year round for me)<br />
3. Herod (fall/winter) <br />
4. Percival (spring/summer)<br />
5. Galloway (spring/summer)<br />
6. Pegasus (fall/winter/spring)<br />
7. Sedley (spring/summer)<br />
8. Greenley (spring/summer)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1565817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1565817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1563462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1563462" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Qleen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1270492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Qleen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Nio-10244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nio"title="Nio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1563462ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1563462" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270492">Qleen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-13">05/13/22 22:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Elegant breezy fresh spicy citrus , the black pepper &amp; iris is what makes this the most unique out of the freshies inside the PDM house  greenly i find To be a more feminine sweet version of nishanes Hacivat not bad @ all just already own the manlier take on that particular dna, sedley is their interpretation of a blue dna in which they did good but has that familiarity of things like Dylan , Prada carbon , sauvage etc so if youre looking for something a little more Everyday and not typical try Galloway great scent in my opinion. I cant say rather i enjoy this over sedley because i burn Them about the same</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1563462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1563462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554589" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudebro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1392247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudebro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247">dudebro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This cologne was a total surprise. its beauty lies in its subtle and clean floral sillage that gently radiates from the body. <br />
<br />
Backstory:<br />
I was on the hunt for a new summer freshie. My search started with Fierce, which I almost blind bought, and I'm glad I didn't. When I tried it in the store at the mall it was gone in an hour. <br />
<br />
I was all but certain I would make up for this by buying Percival, which is known for being a very long-lasting, Fierce-like freshie. What I found interesting was reviews on Percival often include comments on PdM's other fresh fragrance, Galloway.<br />
<br />
nonetheless I headed to Nordstrom with the intention of buying Percival. I'm at the counter and sprayed Percival on the left wrist and Galloway on the right wrist for good measure.<br />
<br />
at first Percival was too sweet to my nose, like some other blue fragrances. I realized why people think this is "generic", but it really smells great in the dry down.<br />
<br />
I test drove these 2 PdMs for two hours as I walked around the mall. The Percival drydown is beautiful as it settles. however the remarkable thing to me was that I kept smelling this lovely, soft swirl of orange blossom and musc around me. The softer Galloway created a more noticeable, and more beautiful sillage, radiating from my body, even though it's a "lighter" scent.<br />
<br />
Review:<br />
though the notes seem simple, the Galloway dry down was not. the peppery orange helps Galloway project for 3 hours, and it never fully fades. Then orange blossom takes the lead, and iris provides a powdery softness, both slowly fading over the next 3 hours, leaving you with a sweetly fresh, airy "second skin" aura in the base. overall I get 6 to 8 hours of longevity. Even at 10+ hours Galloway very subtly lingers.<br />
<br />
I kept trying to convince myself I wanted Percival (which was also great!) but the fact was undeniable. Galloway unexpectedly won my heart to break the tie. The musc is gorgeous, and not at all animalic. it's creamy, soft and clean. the ever-changing introduction of notes elevates this freshie above most on the market. <br />
<br />
overall I would rate this 9/10. If this cologne had friends it would be Another 13, Petit Matin, and Neroli Portofino. <br />
<br />
NOTE: smells nothing like GIT, nor SMW. I own and love the former, and dislike the latter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1554589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1554589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1538798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1538798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anthonycball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1273491.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anthonycball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Forever-pour-Homme-66556.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66556.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"title="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1538798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1538798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273491">anthonycball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 12:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple. Pure. Borlerline minimalistic. Just like the all-white bottle entails. A brief, brisk citrus opening. Gently floral. Evolving into a light, clean musk with the slightest touch of warm amber. This fragrance serves a need; however, performance junkies need not apply.<br />
<br />
There's a growing market for simple, light, minimalistic scents. Whether or not this is what PDM had intended, Galloway has been one such fragrance for me with my full bottle experience. <br />
<br />
An excellent option for those working in close proximity office situations, those who value scent over performance, and anyone seeking a safe, inoffensive, or otherwise borderline minimalistic scent.  <br />
<br />
Rating 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1538798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1538798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1538580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1538580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabearjew82"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202425"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202425.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabearjew82" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Naomi-Goodsir/Cuir-Velours-16581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir Velours"title="Cuir Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1538580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1538580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202425">dabearjew82</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm almost 100 percent sure people are getting expired bottles from discounters based on the reviews below. This smells great and the longevity is very good for a citrus scent. My skin is horrible with citruses but this one sticks around for around 3.5 hours which is good for a edp. Would love it more were it an Extrait with a little more ambergris</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1538580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1538580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1526735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1526735" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnotherFragBoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnotherFragBoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-for-Men-Intense-17666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley for Men Intense"title="Bentley for Men Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1526735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1526735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455581">AnotherFragBoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-19">03/19/22 22:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am wearing this for the first time, about 12 sprays. It's a cold night and I am surrounded by people who have little or nothing to say. (in other words I do not expect to receive any compliments or comments)...<br />
That being said, this scent is actually a well blended freshy. It has been about ten hours since application and this thing still projects well! A double spritz to each outer arm and the performance is great.<br />
The scent profile however is not an eye opener for me. It smells pleasant, and that's it! Nothing more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1526735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1526735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1526697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1526697" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="3NO7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1352698.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="3NO7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Dylan-Blue-40031.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40031.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"title="Versace Pour Homme Dylan Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1526697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1526697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352698">3NO7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-19">03/19/22 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of that TexSun orange juice us Texas boys used to drink way back when. Squeezed straight from Republic of Texas orange trees (its an actual variety of orange tree). Spicy, Bittersweet and definitely an acquired taste, but I wouldnt trade it for the world. <br />
<br />
Somehow, them French folks figured out how to recreate a nostalgic smell from the harsh Texas landscape! <br />
<br />
Bravo! I love it and thank you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1526697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1526697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1512631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1512631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TJ1997"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1281126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1281126.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TJ1997" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Argos/Argos-Pour-Homme-48577.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48577.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Argos Pour Homme"title="Argos Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1281126">TJ1997</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-25">02/25/22 05:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Galloway is a nice clean fragrance. The problem comes with the price, I don't like it enough to warrant the price. It's bright in the opening, the must will quickly become the star player. A slight spicey nuance is detected with Iris acting as a supporting note with some sweetness. <br />
<br />
I usually pass on heavy musky fragrance, but it's done quite well here. Unless I find it for a great price, it's not worth it. That's a big issue with Parfums de Marly, their more oriental cold weather fragrances are better than their warm-weather offerings. <br />
<br />
RATING<br />
Smell: 7/10<br />
Versatility: 7/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10 (8 Hours)<br />
Projection: 7/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10<br />
Sex: Male<br />
Price: 4/10 (overpriced)<br />
RATING: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1511738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1511738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1510590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1510590" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ben0024x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460683.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ben0024x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Pacific-Rock-Moss-44120.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44120.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Rock Moss"title="Pacific Rock Moss"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1510590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1510590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); Although it has a good aroma in general, is it suitable for use as a cologne? No. At least not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1510590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1510590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1510450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1510450" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Messi1743"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Messi1743" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1510450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1510450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464014">Messi1743</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-23">02/23/22 09:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried to like this. I dont have super sophisticated nose but I own Layton and Pegasus exclusif versions in both and Layton. The black pepper note is very strong for me and stays with it very strongly if thats what I am smelling. I dont think this is a blind buy. I had percival and sold it. Thats fare more blind buyworthy.<br />
<br />
Update after I went back to it. Its nice. Its no mind blowing nice. Its unique in a sedated way. Wore it this am as well. Wife asked wow what are you wearing its smells great and she is a tough cookie to please especially with my collection lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1510450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1510450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1503286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1503286" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brantsa21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brantsa21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1503286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1503286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457045">brantsa21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-12">02/12/22 18:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really, really wanted to like this, but there was something about it I couldnt get behind. Although I loved the citrus/zing and musk there was a powdery-ness to it, maybe its just me, but I didnt like it and became a skin scent for me very quickly.<br />
<br />
Percival became a skin scent too but Sedley settles and stays a while for me. So these like others are just really dependent on you so dont think Galloway is unworthy of a try as it has a great scent and is most definitely more masculine leaning given the musky nature of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1503286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1503286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1502768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1502768" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zachtor23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293704"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293704.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zachtor23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1502768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1502768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293704">zachtor23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-12">02/12/22 00:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this scent is perfect. Galloway is, and always will be, my signature scent. <br />
<br />
Its beauty lies in its simplicity; yet it doesn't take its simplicity for granted. Every note and accord is so well done, and the manner in which they are blended leaves traces of intelligence, kindness, and humility.<br />
<br />
The pepper gives the slightest bit of edge and masculinity to the combination of white florals and the white musk. To me, it's gentlemanly, but in a kind way. In an inviting way. It's so simple. But it's simple done to perfection.<br />
<br />
It's casual when I need it to be. It's formal when I need it to be. It's sexy when it needs to be. It's friendly when I need it to be.<br />
<br />
It's perfect for any occasion, literally anytime of the year, and its performance is PERFECT. Every. Single. Time.<br />
<br />
I get my 3 hours of brilliant projection, followed by my 3-4 hours of really nice projection, followed by a second skin with some additional mmph for the remainder of my day/night.<br />
<br />
I get a consistent sillage and scent trail throughout the life of the wear, which brings people in (especially if you have a kind, easygoing, charismatic personality.<br />
<br />
It gets me through my day always, but never overstays its welcome.<br />
<br />
Compliments have been near endless - this scent is me. Be it across a table while outdoors, or in close quarters with a friend or lover, people pick it out, and people identify me by it.<br />
<br />
I feel like my best self when I wear Galloway. I am my most interesting. I am my most lively.  I am my most confident. I am my most high on life.<br />
<br />
I will wear this on my wedding day, on the day I become a father, and on the day I give my Oscars speech.<br />
<br />
Scent: 11/10<br />
Longevity: 10/10 <br />
Sillage: 9/10<br />
Projection: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1502768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1502768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499569" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
