padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1488409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mina Abdo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309700.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mina Abdo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1488409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1488409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309700">Mina Abdo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-22">01/22/22 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>That is easily one of the best summer fragrance you can ever come across. <br />
Fresh, powerful, masculine, spicy and clean.<br />
This is the kind of perfume that makes you understand how niche perfume should be.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1488409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1488409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1488061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1488061" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aroma Bob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aroma Bob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1488061ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1488061" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327170">Aroma Bob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Longest lasting citrus that I have. Will buy another bottle when done if I can get for 130 like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1488061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1488061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1480796" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1480796" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seuni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266523.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seuni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1480796ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1480796" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266523">Seuni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-11">01/11/22 05:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up strong and masculine. There's lots of black pepper and bright, strong citrus, mostly bergamote and white grapefruit. The opening is reminiscent of many masculine, versatile fragrances of today's market - I'm not pointing fingers because I know the reaction already.<br />
<br />
In the mid there's less strong pepper, it goes to the background. The front is mix of citrus, I'd say mostly bergamote and bitter orange, with white orange flower note. <br />
<br />
Dries down to a musk overload, which, by the way, is present since the first seconds after applying. There's a ton of white, fresh aroma smelling like clean, fresh skin, and fresh laundry. There's not much amber I think, the iris is not prominent or dominating. <br />
<br />
In the opening it's peppery, very masculine, strong and dominative with a bergamote background. Later it does smell like what people say - white, warm, out of the printer paper, white linen shirt, an lots of clean skin.<br />
<br />
It's overall unisex, but leaning masculine, especially in the opening. The projection is strong for the first 2-3 hours, then moderate. Lasts about 7, maybe 8 hours when perspirating, on my skin. It's anytime anyone, office safe, but I'd say leaning masculine and best for spring, summer, heat, daytime. <br />
<br />
It's somewhat similar to Dior Homme Cologne, but less soapy sweet and more masculine and musky/powdery. Somewhat similar to Artisan Pure minus all the green notes, plus white notes and pepper masculinity. The opening is similar to (put a masculine, moder, versatile fragrance here), minus woods and aquatics.<br />
<br />
I have to admit, it's not really groundbreaking. It's not boring, but I can imagine this being sold with half it's pricetag at Sephora. No way I'd buy it full reatil, luckily I bought it at a discounter for 40%. I like it, there's quality, surprising performance for a citrus, but if you were to introduce someone to niche with this scent they'd go 'that's it? Really?'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1480796"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1480796#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1470337" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1470337" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dirtyhoody"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159498"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1159498.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dirtyhoody" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Rouge-Saray-60821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rouge Sary"title="Rouge Sary"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1470337ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1470337" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159498">Dirtyhoody</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-25">12/25/21 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super clean and somewhat elegant smelling. Would work in just about any situation. I'm going to get a lot of wear out of this. I should've opted for the big bottle. Oh well I'll just get it as a backup.<br />
<br />
After wearing it a few times I like it way more than layton which I also own. This is just feels better put together.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1470337"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1470337#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1456558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1456558" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jarlai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1201569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jarlai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1456558ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1456558" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201569">Jarlai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-03">12/03/21 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Galloway. Its a citrusy, musky fragrance thats easy to wear. Good for the office, hang out with friends, going for a run I even got compliments wearing it. Performance is awesome and the price is right. Some dont like it because its not exotic enough for them, but I think it is a beautiful fragrance you can wear most of the time, and feel good doing so. It is a champ even not trying hard.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1456558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1456558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449620" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449620" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lamont Cranston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220703"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220703.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lamont Cranston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Absolu-53106.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53106.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Absolu"title="Armani Code Absolu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449620ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449620" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220703">Lamont Cranston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-21">11/21/21 00:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it. The opening reminds me so much of Green Irish Tweed, which is probably my favorite fragrance of all time behind PDM Layton. The dry downs of Galloway and GIT, however, are very different. The base of GIT is a lovely mlange of floral and sandalwood while the base of Galloway has a robust earthiness thanks to the musk. I own both and they are my favorite warm weather fragrances. I save GIT for Spring and Galloway for Summer. <br />
<br />
Of the PDM offerings most folks opt for Percival for warm weather but, in my opinion, Percival is too reminiscent of the gazillion other "blue" fragrances on the market. When you plunk down the considerable amount of scratch that it takes to purchase a PDM fragrance you expect to stand out a little and Percival comes up a tad short in that regard. <br />
<br />
In the opening of Galloway you get the lovely tartness of citrus balanced with the zing of pepper. The pepper is still at the wheel during the drydown but this time it's balanced with some iris. At the base is the musk which, I believe, pushes this firmly into masculine territory. As for performance you can expect projection of 3-5 feet in the first three hours and a skin scent for another five hours. So it has outstanding performance for a freshie warm weather fragrance.<br />
<br />
In summary this is one of the sleeper hits of the PDM line and definitely worth your consideration if you're looking for a Summer beast.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1449620"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1449620#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1449223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1449223" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RoBoT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369566.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RoBoT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1449223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1449223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369566">RoBoT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-20">11/20/21 08:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lets keep this simple, its a niche version of Givenchy Gentleman Cologne. Not exactly the same when compared side by side, but just one smell of Galloway and you can pick it up. This is one of the underrated PdMs IMO. Fantastic spring and summer frag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1449223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1449223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1447160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1447160" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="activeharley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1222874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="activeharley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Aoud-Forest-9559.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9559.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Forest"title="Aoud Forest"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1447160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1447160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); Too simplistic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1447160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1447160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1445245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1445245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Krasseman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397421"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1397421.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Krasseman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1445245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1445245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); Super fresh but not juicy, very dry in a way. Unique take on a fresh citrus scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1445245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1445245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1435670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1435670" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarsOnEarth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarsOnEarth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Unknown-Pleasures-17438.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17438.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unknown Pleasures"title="Unknown Pleasures"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1435670ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1435670" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244317">MarsOnEarth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-27">10/27/21 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To my nose this opens like Lalique white but transforms to a more musky Silver Mountain Water without the ink. I wanted Silver Mountain Water but I think I will be grabbing Galloway. It's never beast mode but it is always there. Nice green musk. Can be dressed up or dressed down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1435670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1435670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Makers001"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Makers001" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328320">Makers001</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-05">10/05/21 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is a smoky wood, like BBQ chips. After initial opening, smells like walking in a green forest with baby powder: earthy, green, powdery and woodsy. Almost smells like hot, freshly printed paper or freshly dried laundry. Great gentlemanly scent that can be worn casually or to the office. Probably my favorite scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1422736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1422736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1410788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1410788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1Nose2RuleThemAll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1292584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="1Nose2RuleThemAll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Essenza-14825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gio Essenza"title="Acqua di Gio Essenza"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1410788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1410788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1292584">1Nose2RuleThemAll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-15">09/15/21 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful refined fresh pepper-citrus combo. Smells well blended but it leans very masculine.<br />
IMO it's not unisex. A lot of nich brands just market most of their perfumes as unisex for more profit and sells.<br />
<br />
<br />
Scent: 9.0/10<br />
Longevity: 8.5/10<br />
Sillage: 8.0/10<br />
Price: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1410788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1410788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408564" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408564ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408564" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-11">09/11/21 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It does smell like freshly cleaned laundry to be fair, as if it's just come out of the tumble dryer and still has that warm smell to it. But I really am not a fan of it at all. Entirely boring and kind of strange. I thought I had walked in front of a heater in the shop at one point when I was smelling this on my arm, and that warm smelling sensation was coming from that, but it turned out it was just the fragrance. I don't get it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1408564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1408564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1405197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1405197" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angelotti rvt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angelotti rvt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Benetton/Colors-de-Benetton-Man-Blue-59499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colors de Benetton Man Blue"title="Colors de Benetton Man Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1405197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1405197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384774">Angelotti rvt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-05">09/05/21 23:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only similarity with laliques white is the pepper, while this is citrus but more orange and of course orange blossom, white is more lemon and pepper.<br />
<br />
Anyways this smells so pleasant, elegant, it makes you thing dressing a white suit, summer but not at the beach, suitable for wedding in a garden or any event in a garden of a big mansion, its really elegant and pleasant.<br />
<br />
Longevity is really long lasting, more than 6 hours for sure, sillage it strong for 2 hours, after that you will notice hints of the smell in the air at least for the next 5 hours when it dries down, but for that you need to apply more than 4 sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1405197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1405197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1396658" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="soroush_mgh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="soroush_mgh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1396658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1396658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378121">soroush_mgh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-21">08/21/21 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Literally, smells like ironing the clothes that are just washed in a washing machine using a high quality washing liquid!<br />
<br />
Simple, classy, sophisticated and long lasting!<br />
This is my second favorite scent from PDM right after Layton Exclusif!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1396658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1396658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1382744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1382744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumeForLainy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193796.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumeForLainy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-Red-Edition-51422.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51422.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L'Eau Red Edition"title="Chanel No 5 L'Eau Red Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1382744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1382744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193796">PerfumeForLainy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-28">07/28/21 05:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Summer test.<br />
Seemingly clean and fresh start, immediately followed by an extremely prominent screechy mineral note, that turnes my stomach. No musc is ever that unpleasant. Very strange, naturally long lasting and hard to remove. Naturally - as in "all of the offensive notes last the longest on us". Reminded me of my first acquaintance with BCR540: "Hmm, this is weird, but potent, what is it? ...oh, dear lord, get it off me and out of the house, bury the bottle deep."<br />
<br />
If you have the same sensitivity as me, take a look at the other PDM perfumes. Percival is closest in freshness and very wearable, the rest are either sweeter or spicier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1382744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1382744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1377012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1377012" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cobrar97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cobrar97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1377012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1377012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353992">cobrar97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-16">07/16/21 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple, yet complex.  It's a fresh-ish frag, but to me it's very well done.  It's my go-to for hotter days where other PDM frags are just too much.  It's not that usual out-of-the-shower soapy fresh, but rather a sophisticated, dry-fresh.  It might not be exciting for some people, but I love it and wear it all the time in the summer.  It projects well and lasts most of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1377012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1377012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1373684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1373684" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1373684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1373684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-10">07/10/21 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>GENTLE DAY SCENT<br />
<br />
This is not ground breaking. Nor should it be. Every niche house needs an easy-to-wear fragrance in their offerings. <br />
<br />
A sparkly, gentle, citrus-floral-musk that dries down beautifully. Unisex but leans masculine. <br />
<br />
Nice job, Marly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1373684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1373684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But its basically a glorified Davidoff Cool Waternot GIT as it lacks that signature green and earthy vibe of Creeds all-time classic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; So clean, simple, and professional. If I had to get a gift for a newbie to the fragrance world that just landed a job at JP Morgan or McKinsey, this would be it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1364028"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1364028#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AMajeedQT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.30910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AMajeedQT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Korloff-Paris/Rose-Oud-52106.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52106.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Oud"title="Rose Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30910">AMajeedQT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-18">06/18/21 01:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Parfums de Marly's most natural.<br />
<br />
Galloway is the most natural-smelling scent PdM has to offer. Galloway is dominated by fresh, juicy, slightly sweet orangish citruses. The fresh zesty citrus is spiced up with a slightly sharp pepper note. Then, a green &amp; herbal tea-like accord give Galloway a more natural grassy/leafy, garden-like smell. This accord is likely the orange blossom/musk combo. The iris &amp; amber are not obvious.<br />
<br />
Fresh, citrusy, spicy, green, zesty, invigorating, musky, mildly-sweet, &amp; natural-smelling.<br />
<br />
It smells like a walk in a garden during summer/spring time. Galloway has to be one of PdM's easiest &amp; most mass-appealing fragrances. Its fresh citrusy/spicy smell is akin to that of deodorants &amp; shower gels, &amp; I don't mean that in a negative way, but it smells like it could be easily the smell of a beautifully-smelling hygiene product. We know there is a lot of that. I've seen so many ask for fragrances that smell like a certain cream or hair product even.<br />
<br />
If you are looking for a citrusy musk, this is a decent option. I think if the pepper was toned down just a bit, 5-10% less, it would've made Galloway even better as it would've rounded its peppery sharpness.<br />
<br />
Nonetheless, Galloway is a very nice warm weather wear that pleases the masses. The noticeable pepper note makes Galloway lean more masculine.<br />
<br />
Big "Like"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1361880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1361880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1359634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1359634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Real Chip Diamond"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Real Chip Diamond" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1359634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1359634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yjinn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yjinn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beach-Hut-Man-46336.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46336.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beach Hut Man"title="Beach Hut Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277409">Yjinn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-08">06/08/21 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can detect all the notes listed and more prominently the iris. It great when a scent smells exactly how you imagined them. But I didn't expect it to smell exactly like Zara Iris home fragrance (not a bad thing). I like this a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1356487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1356487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1353368" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1353368" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stc__24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1344565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stc__24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-One/Office-For-Men-55166.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55166.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Office For Men"title="Office For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1353368ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1353368" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344565">stc__24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-02">06/02/21 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is not a bad scent. I enjoy it. The only problem, for me is that it is not unique. It has a sweet freshness throughout its life. Overpriced, but not a bad scent. In my opinion, it is very mass appealing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1353368"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1353368#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1345938" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1345938" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="b1ad3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="b1ad3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1345938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1345938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312264">b1ad3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-19">05/19/21 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Galloway is a like for me.  This might be the longest lasting citrus I have experienced.  I still pick it up in the dry down.  It screams quality with class and I feel it has a light, piercing essence to it.  There are comparisons to GIT, but only in the iris note in the opening.  I love GIT, but I do not think they are too similar.  Each has unique qualities that stand apart from the other.  Galloway gives off a bit of a leather vibe in the dry down. This is a great fragrance for Spring and possibly Summer (nights), though I'll need to test it out again when it gets super hot to be sure.  It might be too strong for hot Summer days.<br />
<br />
Scent: 3/5<br />
Longevity: 3/5<br />
Sillage: 3/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1345938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1345938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1345562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1345562" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ericstraordinary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1306565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ericstraordinary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1345562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1345562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306565">Ericstraordinary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-18">05/18/21 19:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is nowhere near as boring or bland as I assumed it would be. <br />
It has been described as smelling somewhat of photocopy paper on the drydown, and I guess I can see a little bit of that. I think the best way I can describe the way it feels to me is like walking into a damp bathroom mere seconds after a member of the opposite sex just had a nice, long shower. It is musky, clean, moist and has something that just makes me think of lovely shampooed hair. I am thoroughly enjoying this. <br />
Longevity and projection are decent but not awesome. <br />
The bottle is beautiful and feels well made.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1345562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1345562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Krisena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1279202.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Krisena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279202">Krisena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was surprised to see that leather was not a note in this. My associations immediately went to expensive leather car seats. Somewhat sweet leather car seats. I suppose it's more of an emergent scent? It's pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1336104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1336104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1335946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1335946" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kachimalik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kachimalik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Hindu-Kush-49030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hindu Kush"title="Hindu Kush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1335946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1335946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1176229">kachimalik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 03:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My most mature scent till date. Smells like an English man in a white rolls Royce driving through a field of white florals in spring</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1335946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1335946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1335723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327589">_marcuscortes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-19">04/19/21 00:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very unique citrus scent to me and i love it. Its citrusy but slightly spicy also has a very clean musk. My girlfriend loves it and so do my boys. I think this is super mass appealing, great for young adults since it doesnt come off as a super mature scent to me, its even come to be my new signature scent! Great longevity at 8 hrs and i think it can be worn year round but it will thrive in the spring and summer. Sample worthy for sure i wouldnt suggest blind buying any fragrance but we are all guilty of that lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1328036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1328036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322636" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1319011" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrDohm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254779.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrDohm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1319011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1319011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254779">DrDohm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-03">04/03/21 19:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is awesome, classic and modern in the same time, young and old can wear this, suitable for spring and to some extent summer, but there is something about this fragrance I can't tolerate, something harsh and sharp bother me just minutes after the opening, maybe the spices, to be more specific black pepper, maybe some people don't feel the way I feel, or they feel nothing is harsh or sharp.<br />
<br />
This fragrance one of the fragrances that you should try once and twice, get a sample and try it and wear it full wear and see if you like it, I'm not trying to say its bad scent, but maybe is not suitable for me due to what I mentioned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Layton but I bought the sample set as well. Herod is a bona fide killer, as is Pegasus Exclusif. Percival was a disappointment, it wasnt bad, it was just really average &amp; overpriced. Galloway is really good, its different. My gf wears Delina Exclusif &amp; they really complement each other.
