padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honcho Davo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honcho Davo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1270609">Honcho Davo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-25">03/25/21 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DO NOT BLIND BUY. I get a very smooth, spicy musk with a hint of sweetness. Not my cup of tea. Can't even decide what season to wear this in. <br />
<br />
First blind bought this over a year ago. Hated it. Wanted to give it another shot now with my nosed being a bit more developed. Still hate it. However, after it dries down deep into 4 hours the spiciness goes away and is quite pleasant. Still wouldn't wear tho. Take review this with a grain of salt cuz we're all different. My girlfriend actually loves this on me but I'd never wear it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1314047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1314047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1312876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1312876" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JohnnyFunk69"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1316618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JohnnyFunk69" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1312876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1312876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1316618">JohnnyFunk69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-23">03/23/21 19:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is pretty meh. It isn't a bad scent. It's just very boring and doesn't stand out. I think it's the worst of parfums de marly even though it is still high quality. It smells like a fresh, clean musk with some oriental thing in the background. Percival and sedley are much better fresh fragrances. I don't think this is worth the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1312876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1312876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1312834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1312834" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bfish88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bfish88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Journey-Man-25251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Journey Man"title="Journey Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1312834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1312834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812">Bfish88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-23">03/23/21 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My goodness this is great! It was love at 1st sample for sure. I get everything except the iris and amber. The pepper and citrus blends with white florals and musk to make this a very well blended unique and pleasant fragrance. (Never smelled lalique white) But Galloway has a very addictive scent to it and is not your typical citrus summer freshie. I get a bit of woodsy nuance probably from the pepper, sometimes cedar smells like pepper to me. But this has great lasting power for a spring or summer fragrance. It's a good balance of light and dark, strong and soft, unique and pleasing. Well done PDM, this gets a personal 10/10 from me! I have Percival, Sedley and Galloway and even though I'm in the minority probably, Galloway is MY favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1312834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1312834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1309067" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1309067" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Bois-D-Argent-48396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois D'Argent"title="Bois D'Argent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1309067ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1309067" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-16">03/16/21 20:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice opening.  More interesting than I expected. <br />
Smells soapy and clean IMO.<br />
Swiss army knife frag that can be used in nearly every scenario except formal. <br />
Nice performance.  Underrated IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1309067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1309067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="23271" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1502768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1502768" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zachtor23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293704"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293704.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zachtor23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1502768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1502768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293704">zachtor23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-12">02/12/22 00:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this scent is perfect. Galloway is, and always will be, my signature scent. <br />
<br />
Its beauty lies in its simplicity; yet it doesn't take its simplicity for granted. Every note and accord is so well done, and the manner in which they are blended leaves traces of intelligence, kindness, and humility.<br />
<br />
The pepper gives the slightest bit of edge and masculinity to the combination of white florals and the white musk. To me, it's gentlemanly, but in a kind way. In an inviting way. It's so simple. But it's simple done to perfection.<br />
<br />
It's casual when I need it to be. It's formal when I need it to be. It's sexy when it needs to be. It's friendly when I need it to be.<br />
<br />
It's perfect for any occasion, literally anytime of the year, and its performance is PERFECT. Every. Single. Time.<br />
<br />
I get my 3 hours of brilliant projection, followed by my 3-4 hours of really nice projection, followed by a second skin with some additional mmph for the remainder of my day/night.<br />
<br />
I get a consistent sillage and scent trail throughout the life of the wear, which brings people in (especially if you have a kind, easygoing, charismatic personality.<br />
<br />
It gets me through my day always, but never overstays its welcome.<br />
<br />
Compliments have been near endless - this scent is me. Be it across a table while outdoors, or in close quarters with a friend or lover, people pick it out, and people identify me by it.<br />
<br />
I feel like my best self when I wear Galloway. I am my most interesting. I am my most lively.  I am my most confident. I am my most high on life.<br />
<br />
I will wear this on my wedding day, on the day I become a father, and on the day I give my Oscars speech.<br />
<br />
Scent: 11/10<br />
Longevity: 10/10 <br />
Sillage: 9/10<br />
Projection: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1502768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1502768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018575" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darokes85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293316.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darokes85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Silver-53400.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53400.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Silver"title="Gentle Fluidity Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293316">Darokes85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get why people say its boring and generic, especially if youre someone that enjoys bold and unique fragrances. I get why people may expect more from PDM considering its a niche house selling fragrances at luxury price points. But can we normalize niche fragrance houses creating high quality well blended simple fragrances without dismissal. Sure you can find a cheaper alternative of this DNA but you get what you pay for a cheap synthetic smelling composition. Galloway may smell basic, boring, and generic but no one can criticize the high quality this fragrance possesses. We all love a bold and unique, statement making fragrance but we all need a simple understated fragrance in our collection for those boring simple everyday moments in our lives. Like grocery shopping, doctors appointments, going to school or the gym etc. Surely you cant expect to show up EVERYWHERE wearing oud, spicy, gourmand compositions. Thats tacky and obnoxious. Balance out your collection with a high quality clean, simple and basic scent like Galloway. <br />
<br />
It smells like crisp cleanliness. A very balanced and smooth citrus, musk and wood combo with a spicy opening. Its not your typical clean fragrance but a luxurious clean scent. Smells like someone who bathes using the most exclusive and expensive bath products on the market and is very healthy and rich . Smells like a Doctor on their off time. Someone whos better than most people but is still pleasant and humble for the sake of their career and reputation. Smells like someone who smells great NATURALLY like they smell amazing without wearing a fragrance, just soap and water, deodorant and clean laundered clothes. <br />
<br />
Performance is great too lasting about 6 to 8 hours with a nice projection a little bit south of 2 feet. Leaves a really nice crisp but warm clean musky sillage. Also 100% genderless. The opening is a tad bit off putting with the spicy pepper, but it fades and blends in with the other notes beautifully mere minutes after spraying. <br />
<br />
TLDR: dont be that insufferable fragrance snob who cant enjoy or at least appreciate a very nice well made simple fragrance. Galloway is a great option if you want to smell clean and luxurious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="2018575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=2018575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554589" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dudebro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1392247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dudebro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1392247">dudebro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This cologne was a total surprise. its beauty lies in its subtle and clean floral sillage that gently radiates from the body. <br />
<br />
Backstory:<br />
I was on the hunt for a new summer freshie. My search started with Fierce, which I almost blind bought, and I'm glad I didn't. When I tried it in the store at the mall it was gone in an hour. <br />
<br />
I was all but certain I would make up for this by buying Percival, which is known for being a very long-lasting, Fierce-like freshie. What I found interesting was reviews on Percival often include comments on PdM's other fresh fragrance, Galloway.<br />
<br />
nonetheless I headed to Nordstrom with the intention of buying Percival. I'm at the counter and sprayed Percival on the left wrist and Galloway on the right wrist for good measure.<br />
<br />
at first Percival was too sweet to my nose, like some other blue fragrances. I realized why people think this is "generic", but it really smells great in the dry down.<br />
<br />
I test drove these 2 PdMs for two hours as I walked around the mall. The Percival drydown is beautiful as it settles. however the remarkable thing to me was that I kept smelling this lovely, soft swirl of orange blossom and musc around me. The softer Galloway created a more noticeable, and more beautiful sillage, radiating from my body, even though it's a "lighter" scent.<br />
<br />
Review:<br />
though the notes seem simple, the Galloway dry down was not. the peppery orange helps Galloway project for 3 hours, and it never fully fades. Then orange blossom takes the lead, and iris provides a powdery softness, both slowly fading over the next 3 hours, leaving you with a sweetly fresh, airy "second skin" aura in the base. overall I get 6 to 8 hours of longevity. Even at 10+ hours Galloway very subtly lingers.<br />
<br />
I kept trying to convince myself I wanted Percival (which was also great!) but the fact was undeniable. Galloway unexpectedly won my heart to break the tie. The musc is gorgeous, and not at all animalic. it's creamy, soft and clean. the ever-changing introduction of notes elevates this freshie above most on the market. <br />
<br />
overall I would rate this 9/10. If this cologne had friends it would be Another 13, Petit Matin, and Neroli Portofino. <br />
<br />
NOTE: smells nothing like GIT, nor SMW. I own and love the former, and dislike the latter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1554589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1554589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1249128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1249128" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="simpatica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/357111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.357111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="simpatica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1249128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1249128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/357111">simpatica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-15">11/15/20 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was having second thoughts because I was afraid Galloway would be too masculine for a woman since I don't really see reviews here from women,  but eventually purchased it blindly.<br />
I'm glad I did. I actually love it ! It smells fresh, clean, unique and really nice. <br />
I think Women can really wear Galloway, it's not too masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1249128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1249128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222071" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rob.weston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243433"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243433.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rob.weston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243433">Rob.weston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-09">09/09/20 03:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is sophisticated, intriguing, playful, elegant, flirtatious, and charming. It's a total compliment magnet. Damn, it smells great! Wow! It's also entertaining, in a sense that, it takes you on an interesting journey, as it's nowhere near being linear. I kept bopping my head side-to-side to get whiffs all throughout the day. I did not get any compliments, which is something that I cannot expect each time I wear a fragrance. Some people usually notice that you smell great, but they simply don't care to let you know. <br />
<br />
On sillage It literally fills up a room. The fragrance triggers nice trails of scent bubbles. I usually have a female friend to test fragrances with, queuing me, by indicating when / if she could smell me after walking by few times, but she was not available today. I had a buddy of mine doing the job for few minutes.<br />
<br />
Conclusion This is a wonderful fragrance with superb performance, and I absolutely admire it. I plan to buy a backup bottle, so I have it for a lifetime. It's extrait de parfum concentration, and it's quite strong. You don't need more than four sprays. It also seems versatile, in terms of Seasons. During the Summer, two full sprays should be enough. Though, I recommend nighttime wear during Summer Season. I personally would avoid wearing it during the Summer altogether. This niche fragrance is a masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1222071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1222071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="23271" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>

                            <div id="parent945934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc945934" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arsenal Till I Die"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arsenal Till I Die" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma945934ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd945934" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507">Arsenal Till I Die</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-24">05/24/18 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Parfums De Marly Galloway - Musky violet and pepper. Done.  How are they allowed to charge that much money for something that smellls so similar to the Lalique which is such a basic scent. Youve got to be the biggest snob alive to not try the Lalique. Such a grotty pairing of notes. Strong dislike.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="945934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=945934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1583008" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arber Cami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.102830.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arber Cami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pigmentarium/Genesis-74523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Genesis"title="Genesis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1583008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1583008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/102830">Arber Cami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Musky, peppery, ozonic smell. Nothing unique and boring to say the least. Opens up peppery and citrusy, dry down is slightly musky, peppery with an ozonic violet leaf/cucumber smell. Pass 100%.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1583008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1583008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1002167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1002167" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doownehpets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/967991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.967991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="doownehpets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Extreme-60284.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60284.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme Idal Extrme"title="L'Homme Idal Extrme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1002167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1002167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/967991">doownehpets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-18">11/18/18 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I picked up a bottle cause there was a 20% off coupon or something. I really like the opening blast. The orange blossom smells amazing. A few minutes after that it smells a little harsh, don't like it as much. The musk and the pepper start to come through and the citrus fades to the background. After a while the pepper becomes too much, like make you wanna sneeze pepper. Ultimately I don't like it. I just never want to wear it, there's always things I'd rather wear more. Looking to get rid of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1002167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1002167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1155369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1155369" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meroo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/472277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.472277.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meroo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Tragedy-of-Lord-George-40716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Tragedy of Lord George"title="The Tragedy of Lord George"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1155369ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1155369" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/472277">meroo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-15">03/15/20 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've 4 pillars on which I base how I judge a scent:<br />
-Do I like it?<br />
-Uniqueness<br />
-Performance &amp; quality<br />
-Value<br />
<br />
Do I like it?<br />
Nope, I'm not a fan of black pepper and citrus openings, I find them too much and offensive. Here, the black pepper is too in your face. The dry down is more musky and powdery, so it's better, still a "meh".<br />
<br />
Uniqueness<br />
It's not groundbraking<br />
<br />
Performance and quality<br />
All PdM have high quality that you can feel everytime you mell them. Performance, this one is not great on my skin.<br />
<br />
Value<br />
Well!!<br />
<br />
So I don't like this one, would never buy it, would even go as far as saying, even if you like it, it's too expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1155369"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1155369#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Krisena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1279202.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Krisena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1279202">Krisena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-02">05/02/21 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was surprised to see that leather was not a note in this. My associations immediately went to expensive leather car seats. Somewhat sweet leather car seats. I suppose it's more of an emergent scent? It's pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="23271"comment_id="1336104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html?ccid=1336104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="23271" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.23271.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Galloway-23271.html#cc2370921"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Parfums de Marly</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Galloway</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Immidiately after spraying it gives realistic gin and tonic smell and after minute or two what I can detect is peppery citruses and distinguishable warm musk (maybe habanolide or cashmeran). For me its the more unisex version of MFK Gentle Fluidity Silver.">by
            <em>JJ2137</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69248.png"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.96263.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Art-Bruet/German-Angst-96263.html#cc2370920"><span class="link-span"></span>

        customize_perfume_page:"Customize perfume page",
        customize_small_chart:"Small chart",
        customize_large_chart:"Large chart",
        customize_colors:"Colors",
        customize_charts_size:"Charts size",
    }

    let pulseLangVariables = {
        pulse:"Fragrantica Pulse",
        pulse_intro:"Welcome to Fragrantica Pulse! This feature helps you discover the trending perfumes over different time periods.         pulse_7days:"7 days",
        pulse_30days:"30 days",
        pulse_90days:"90 days",
        pulse_noise_to_signal:"Noise to Signal Ratio",
        pulse_more_noise:"more noise",
        pulse_more_popular:"more popular",
        female:"female",
        male:"male",
        unisex:"unisex",
    }

    let done_flickity = false;
</script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
